placeInfo/address: 84, Nilaveli Road 3rd Mile Post, Trincomalee, Trincomalee 31000 Sri Lanka
text:
We had an absolutely amazing stay at Uppuveli Beach By DSK near Trincomalee. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with genuine warmth. The young staff was incredibly hospitable and did everything they could to make our stay enjoyable and comfortable.

We stayed in a spacious bungalow with a private pool, which was well-equipped with all the necessary amenities, including thoughtful touches like disposable toothbrushes and shaving kits. The shared pool area was also lovely, and the sunbeds right on the beach made relaxing even easier.

We opted for the half board option. On the first evening and morning, meals were served buffet-style, but due to fewer guests on the following days, the meals were à la carte—which was actually a nice change. On our last evening, dinner was beautifully served on the beach, which made the experience even more special.

A special thank you goes to Sanjay, one of the waiters, whose kindness and attentiveness truly made our stay unforgettable.

If I could offer one suggestion to the management, it would be to make the main restaurant and the two beachside restaurants a bit cozier in terms of atmosphere, as they currently feel a bit stark.

All in all, highly recommended for anyone looking for a relaxing and personal beach getaway!
title: Wonderful Stay at Uppuveli Beach By DSK

placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
Being a Marriott Bonvoy member, I booked this hotel Last Summer. Although I tried many hotels during my stay, The Sheraton Kosgoda stood out for it's great guest experience. The reception is open and pretty and we were greeted with a delicious fruit drink. Check in was easy and the reception team was top notch. We were assigned a team member (Marlon) to take care of all our needs during our stay and he was fabulous and able to answer any question we had and even giving us a great dinner recommendation in the area. He was always on call for us with a cell phone number we were given to reach him directly. Amazing customer service.
The rooms are large, pristine clean, fresh and the beds comfortable - nothing to complain about. We were touched with a welcome box full of sweet treats and a fruit basket ( probably because of our Marriott status I think) there was a personalized note as well. At every turn in the hotel, the customer service and politeness was excellent, smiles and good mornings and good nights by everyone, even the groundskeepers and cleaning crew. the grounds are kept beautifully with a huge pool area. The drinks and bites at the pool bar were unique interesting and not watered down. The breakfast buffet was overwhelming with so many stations and you had no room to try everything. The local food was delicious and the breakfast staff too were courteous. fresh hoppers was a treat! and the Seeni sambol best I had on the island. This hotel had some of the best food we had on the island. Overall, a very pleasant and comfortable stay with superior quality amenities, and service. The hotel is easily accessible  to the elephant safari, and the turtle hatchery which is a must visit is conveniently located a few minutes walk on the beach next door, We felt so welcome and cannot wait to return.
title: Superior customer service and attention to detail

We stayed for a night while traveling thru Sri Lanka, and this is easily one of the nicest hotels we've ever stayed. We have status with Marriott, and between that and it being our anniversary, we were upgraded to maybe the biggest hotel room I've ever seen. The room was beautiful and I'm mostly sad we couldn't enjoy it more.

Sathya in the front office was incredibly helpful and attentive to our needs. She was kind and helped explain the room, as well as offered tour information for us.

The hotel restaurant for breakfast is incredible. They had just about every offering you could hope for, and excellently prepared.

I can't see enough good things about this stop. I highly, highly recommend it.

We’re delighted to know you had a relaxing and enjoyable holiday and that you appreciated our well-maintained property, spacious rooms, and the culinary variety we take pride in offering. Your kind words about the quality of food and drinks are much appreciated by our culinary and service teams.

We have noted your comments regarding the beach and the high waves, which are often seasonal. We continuously work with local authorities to maintain the beachfront, and your feedback is a helpful reminder for us to keep pushing for improvements.

We sincerely regret to hear about your impression of preferential treatment toward non-all-inclusive guests. Please be assured that we value all our guests equally, and we will review our service standards to ensure consistency and fairness across all guest experiences.

placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Auf jeden Fall die Schildkröten Farm um die Ecke besuchen!
text:
Wir haben einen richtig schönen und erholsamen Urlaub verbracht! Das Hotel ist sehr gepflegt, mit großen und sauberen Zimmern – genau das, was man sich für einen erholsamen Aufenthalt wünscht.

Das Essen war hervorragend: Es gab immer etwas anderes, eine große Auswahl und alles hat sehr gut geschmeckt. Auch die Getränke waren lecker – die All-Inclusive-Getränkekarte war zwar nicht riesig, aber vollkommen in Ordnung.

Der Strand war schön, allerdings könnte er sauberer sein. Durch die hohen Wellen war das Schwimmen leider nicht immer möglich.

Ein großer Minuspunkt war, dass Gäste ohne All-Inclusive manchmal bevorzugt behandelt wurden – das hat leider den Gesamteindruck etwas getrübt.

Ein echtes Highlight war jedoch Bandu, der am Strand Touren anbietet. Er ist super freundlich und geht individuell auf alle Wünsche ein. Wir haben ihm gesagt, was wir sehen möchten, und daraufhin hat er perfekte, maßgeschneiderte Touren für uns organisiert. Sein Auto ist sehr sauber und gepflegt, er fährt ruhig und sicher – was im verrückten Verkehr dort wirklich wichtig ist. Und: Seine Preise sind deutlich günstiger als beim Reiseveranstalter! Bandu spricht sehr gutes Englisch, Deutsch und sogar Russisch.

Ganz klare Empfehlung: Wenn ihr Touren machen wollt, dann nur mit Bandu! Seine WhatsApp-Nummer ist: +94 (77) 783 6537

Vielen Dank für diesen schönen Urlaub!
title: Toller Aufenthalt mit super Essen und individuellem Ausflugs-Highlight

placeInfo/address: Pothgul Mawatha, Polonnaruwa 51000 Sri Lanka
text:
We spent two nights at EKHO Lake House and absolutely loved every moment. The location is ideal right by the lake and only a few minutes from the Polonnaruwa ruins. Waking up to the sunrise over the water was magical.

The service was some of the best we’ve experienced in Sri Lanka. Isuru from the front office helped us arrange everything from tuk-tuk tours to a special candlelit dinner by the lake. The entire team was friendly, professional, and genuinely cared about guest experience.

The rooms were well-appointed and beautifully designed to blend with the historical surroundings. We also appreciated the little details fresh flowers, evening turndown service, and personalized greetings. Hats off to Nuwan and the staff for managing this place so beautifully.

This is a place you come back to not just for the location, but for how it makes you feel. Don’t miss it!
title: Stunning Location & Exceptional Hospitality!

placeInfo/address: Pothgul Mawatha, Polonnaruwa 51000 Sri Lanka
text:
Absolutely stunning boutique hotel right on one of the largest man made lakes built in the 12th century. The place is so serene and beautiful with gorgeous suites including a Royal suite where Queen Elizabeth had stayed in 1954 (the Royal Suite still houses the original desk and bathtub used by HRH). 

I can’t think of anything more relaxing than sitting on the expansive verandah on a rocking chair sipping a cup of tea. 

However no matter how beautiful a place is it is the hospitality of the staff that takes it to the next level. The staff were absolutely wonderful and attended to our every need. 

The food was delicious and the Sri Lankan delicacies were a highlight. 

Ekho lake house is a little gem perfectly located to explore Polonnaruwa and the surrounding cultural region and is a blissful escape for couples and families alike. 

Niluka Pinto
title: Stunning boutique hotel right on the Parakrama Samudra reservoir

placeInfo/address: Pothgul Mawatha, Polonnaruwa 51000 Sri Lanka
text: EKHO Lake House Polonnaruwa is a true hidden gem in Sri Lanka’s Cultural Triangle. The setting is idyllic, nestled beside the beautiful Parakrama Samudra, offering stunning views and peaceful vibes. But what made our stay truly unforgettable was the incredible staff. Mr. Nuwan, the Resident Manager, went out of his way to ensure we were comfortable and happy. He even personally checked in on us during meals. Front office staff Wasantha and Isuru were so helpful and knowledgeable – always ready to assist with a smile and provide great travel tips. Priyantha, the Restaurant Manager, deserves special praise. His service was five-star; he managed his team with elegance and made sure every dining experience was smooth and enjoyable. The breakfast and dinner menus were varied and delicious, and the lakeside dining atmosphere made it even more special. Our room was cozy, clean, and full of character. We loved the quiet and calm environment, perfect after a day of exploring ancient ruins. EKHO Lake House truly combines old-world charm with warm hospitality. Thank you to Mr. Nuwan and his team – Priyantha, Wasantha, and Isuru – for a perfect stay. We’ll definitely return.
title: Polonnaruwa’s Best Kept Secret!

text:
Today i have finished a delightful restful holiday  here at the edan .A beautiful hotel on the edge of the beach with caring attentive staff
 We arrived 14 days ago tired after a long flight throughout the night however the moment we walked through the door we were greeted with warm smiles and a can do attitude 
 Our room on the ground floor was immaculate  clean with a large bathroom and flowers on the bed a great touch. We were able to step out of our room through our balcony to a great pool ideal for cooling down on a hot sunny afternoon or watching children have fun swimming safely.There was even a swim up bar what more could you want
The sun loungers were siruated on grass with views of the sea and the palm squirrels running around kept us entertained while we rested
 The staff at this hotel from the delightful   guest relations  ladies with their candles and warm smiles  to the pool man  to all the waiters bar attendees cleaners and security  people  are a credit to the hotel stopping to chat  engage and inform us of this beautiful  country .No question we asked however stupid was  not answered  fully showing your culture to our hearts
It inspired us to go on several excursions and enjoy this beautiful place 
The food was  delightful especially the ala carte restaurant  and the breakfast buffet  allowing us to enjoy a typical siri Lankan  meal or breakfast  thanks to all the chiefs that fed us 
We must also take the time to thank the spa staff for the  beautiful  massage  me and my wife enjoyed 
We will certainly  be back
title: Fabulous holiday

We recently spend 2 weeks in Eden and it was really great experience.The hotel is very clean and the service was brilliant.Despite it being end of season in sir Lanka everyone did their very best to keep the bar high and not take foot of the pedal . Best place to stay if you are looking to try real SirLankan kitchen with abundance .Western food was also great . If you have really sweet tooth as my husband has variety of local -continental deserts and cakes are always available.Breakfast and dinner served as a buffet with separate pancake and waffles station.If you like to experience local and traditional dishes each morning and evening you could try it to . All stuff appreciated that we both try new things each day . Lunch was a game changer with a la cart menu that want repeat even once through our stay . Big shoutout to F&B manager who chatted with us each time around .Pest SPA for me in long time .Absolutely brilliant.Great pool ,very clean around and open for snacks and drinks throughout the day . 
 Big shoutout to lovely ladies from guest relations area especially Yoshundura ( hopefully pronounced correctly) I had a bit emergency on my first night in hotel .She offered me support of hotel doctors ,arranged a room service and waited with me till the swelling from my eye gone down ( us Brits ) love sun !!!
Sri Lanka delivered big time for us with Eden
title: Great Holiday!!

My wife and I had the joy of spending two unforgettable nights at Shangri-La Hambantota during our honeymoon (29 and 30 May), and we couldn’t have chosen a more perfect place to celebrate this special time.

From the moment we arrived, we were greeted with grace and warmth. The resort is breathtaking — surrounded by nature, beautifully landscaped, and set against the backdrop of the stunning southern coastline. It offered the perfect balance of luxury, tranquility, and Sri Lankan charm.

Our room was spacious, spotless, and elegantly decorated, with thoughtful honeymoon touches that made us feel truly special. The view from our balcony was absolutely serene, and every detail reflected the resort’s world-class standards.

The food was exceptional — from breakfast to dinner, every meal was a delight. We also loved the range of activities and the peaceful atmosphere of the pool and gardens. Most of all, we were touched by the kindness and professionalism of the staff, who went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable, relaxing, and memorable.

Thank you, Shangri-La Hambantota, for being part of our honeymoon journey. You helped create memories we will treasure for a lifetime. We look forward to returning in the years ahead.

Sangakkara & Emna

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Rupal
Thank you for your thoughtful and detailed feedback. We're delighted to hear you enjoyed the facilities, pools, spa treatment, and service from our team—especially Janaka’s support on excursions.

We appreciate your suggestions regarding evening entertainment, food variety, and bar atmosphere. These insights are valuable and will guide our ongoing efforts to enhance the guest experience, especially during the off-season.

General Manager
placeInfo/address: Sittrakala Estate Chithragala, Hambantota, Tangalle 82100 Sri Lanka
text:
Our stay was in June, which was during the off-season.

**Hotel Facilities and Atmosphere:**
The hotel had plenty of space, and the grounds were nice, offering ample room to relax. The beach sea was quite rough, making it unsuitable for swimming. The hotel was quiet from Monday to Thursday, with weekends being busier, especially with locals, but still maintaining a spacious feel.

The pools were excellent, with a good kids' pool, an infinity adult pool, and a family pool. All of them offered plenty of space and warm water, allowing us to stay in all day.

One area for improvement was the evening entertainment. There wasn't much available, which was a shame given the suitability of the grounds for such activities. Even some music in the lobby after dinner would have been appreciated, as evenings felt like there was nothing to do but return to our rooms.

**Food:**
The buffet breakfast offered a good selection. For dinner, while a la carte options were available, we never saw anyone utilizing them, which made them less inviting. The buffet had Indian, Sri Lankan, and Asian offerings, but it became a bit repetitive after a few days, and the vegetarian selection was limited. It was also frustrating that the dinner options were better from Friday to Sunday, which felt unfair to us since we were there for both weekdays and weekends.

**Drinks:**
Alcoholic drinks were very expensive, even by UK standards, unless they were local brands. The bars also lacked atmosphere, so they weren't places we felt inclined to simply go and relax unless we specifically wanted a drink.

**Excursions:**
We used the hotel for three days of trips, and our driver, Janaka, was excellent and knowledgeable. He struck the perfect balance of providing information and allowing us to explore, and we would definitely use him again. I suspect that organizing excursions through the hotel might be more expensive than arranging them yourself, but it certainly offers a hassle-free experience.

**Spa:**
We had a treatment at the spa, which was excellent.

**Summary:**
Overall, we enjoyed the hotel and its facilities. I would rate it a 4-star experience, with the main areas for improvement being the dinner options and the evening entertainment.

Staff were all very good throughout. 

Please note that the hotel is about a 3.5-hour drive from Colombo airport (as we do not fly to the local one). The roads and highways are good, but this adds to the overall travel time door-to-door.
title: Great Trip - some minor improvement could make it amazing

text:
We recently spent a wonderful weekend at the Shangri-La Hotel in Hambantota, and it was truly an unforgettable experience. From the moment we arrived, we were blown away by the stunning property and the natural beauty of Sri Lanka’s south coast.

The warmth and attentiveness of the staff were exceptional. They truly embodied the spirit of Sri Lankan hospitality, taking care of every detail to ensure our stay was perfect. The resort is ideal for families—our kids absolutely loved the pools and the wide range of activities available, keeping them entertained throughout our stay.

One of our favorite highlights was the sports bar with its fantastic view of the golf course, and the buggy ride through the lush greens made it even more memorable. Dining was also a delight, with a great variety of delicious options at all the restaurants.

A special mention goes to the Front Desk Manager Dammika , who was incredibly friendly and took the time to explain all the resort’s features. His attention to guest satisfaction was clear, and he, along with his team, made sure everyone felt welcomed and well taken care of.

If you’re looking for a relaxing, family-friendly getaway with top-notch service and stunning surroundings, Shangri-La Hambantota is a perfect choice. We can’t wait to visit again!

text:
We absolutely loved Sri Lanka and staying at Chimneys hotel was an unforgettable experience. Nuwara Eliya and this area of the central highlands are truly beautiful and well worth visiting and exploring before heading up to Ella. And when you do you must stay at Chimneys! 

Everything was just wonderful - the beautiful, comfortable room, the amazing and adorable staff, the delicious breakfast and food. It was a ture experience just to stay in this beautiful building and the amazing staff made the stay even more unforgetable. 

A special mention to Dave, Krishnan and the excellent chef. My wife and I got engaged on our trip in Sri Lanka and when the staff at Chimneys found out they went out of their way to make us feel even more special. It was a joy to share the excitement with them. Later on check out we made a mistake with the payment and caught the train up to Ella before we realised. Dave came all the way to Ella on motorbike to resolve the issue (sorry again Dave!) for which we are truly grateful. Absolutely top hospitality and we only wish we could have stayed longer. 

Chimenys is one of our three favourite hotels in the whole world! It is our dream to return to Chimneys and Sri Lanka one day! 

Alex and Georgina (visited April 2024)
title: Fabulous Hotel, Wonderful Staff, Amazing Experience. One of our three favourite hotels in the whole world!

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
text:
Ein wunderschönes Hotel! Wir wurden so unglaublich freundlich empfangen , das war besonders. Zum Check-in erstmal einen Kaffee und einen selbstgebackenen Kuchen, einfach herzlich und lecker. Wir haben ein tolles Zimmer bekommen, großzügig geschnitten, toller Ausblick, luxuriöses Bad. Alles im englischen Landhausstil, schöner Garten, „very British“, very stylish. Jeder Wunsch wurde uns von den Lippen abgelesen.
Kleiner Wermutstropfen: Das Essen! Wir hatten Weißwein zum Essen bestellt, es gab noch EIN Glas. Wir fragten nach Rotwein, es gab noch EINE Flasche. Das Essen wurde unmittelbar nach dem Hinsetzen serviert, noch vor irgendwelchen Getränken. Alles sehr hektisch. Man hatte die Wahl zwischen typisch Sri-lankischem Essen und  „westlichem“ Essen. Wir haben westlich gewählt, das Essen war gerade eben so ok…. Am Nachbartisch gab es Reis und Curry, das sah deutlich besser aus. 
Alles zusammen: Ein großartiger Ort, mit etwas Potential zur Weiterentwicklung. Wenn die Küche so gut wird wird die Einrichtung, die Freundlichkeit, der Charme des Hauses, dann wird es wirklich perfekt.
title: Ein wunderschöner Ort!

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
text:
Herzlicher Empfang mit selbstgemachten Kuchen und feinen Kaffee. Zimmer sehr geräumig, großzügig. Alles perfekt. Auch das Abendessen war großartig und der Empfang von Frank sowie die Betreuung unfassbar herzlich. 
Man hat uns, da es geregnet hatte, Wärmeflaschen abends ins Bett gebracht, noch Duftöl-Lampe aktiviert-alles sehr bedacht und für uns angenehm gestaltet. Ich kann das Hotel weiterempfehlen. Hier fehlt es an nichts! Vielen Dank nochmals an Frank!
title: Durchreise, Zwischenstopp

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
text:
Ein sehr tolles Hotel im britischen Stil mit schön gepflegtem Garten und recht ruhig gelegen. Ein wunderbares großes Zimmer mit gemütlicher Sitzgelegenheit direkt am großen Fenster mit Blick auf den Garten und das Nebengebäude. 
Der Empfang war sehr herzlich, wir wurden in den Salon begleitet und es wurde heimischer Kaffee und selbstgemachte Kekse serviert.
Das Abendessen war wirklich sehr gut, es konnte aus drei  Hauptspeisen gewählt werden. Das Personal sehr zuvorkommend, freundlich und aufmerksam. Auch das Frühstück war gut und ausreichend.
Schade, dass wir auf unserer Rundreise hier nur eine Nacht waren, hier könnte man sicher länger bleiben, wenn man Ruhe sucht.
title: TOP - Uns hat es hier sehr gut gefallen!

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
text:
It's situated very close to Nuwara Eliya town (5 minutes from the grand hotel), but away from all the crowds and noise. The Nuwara Eliya town tends to turn into a traffic jam on holidays and long weekends and the never ending concerts (if you can call them that) at the banks of Gregory Lake can get a bit tedious. I was so thrilled when I found out that I could no longer hear the ghastly music coming from the banks of Gregory Lake once I got to this property :)))

The property is situated in a lovely location bordering the Galways land national park. So, if you are looking for a place not too far from the town but away from all the crowds and noise this is the ideal location. 

It's not the usual colonial bungalow but has a slightly more modern European vibe to it and tastefully decorated. The room was very spacious. My favorite part was the lovely window seat. 

The staff was very courteous and attentive. Special mention must be made of Kishan who served us. The food was a set menu, but taste wise it was excellent. And we also noticed that even though the place wasn't crowded, they needed a little extra time to prepare the meals. But to be fair, each time we were informed in advance as to how long they would take.

The access road was in good condition and the Google map directions were accurate. But a more prominent name board at the property would have been help as it took us a little time to find the correct entrance.

They also have two very friendly doggies who may have contributed to my rating ;)

I would highly recommend this place if you are looking to chill in peace and quiet....
title: Away from the crowds

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka

This hotel is not what we would usually pick, but good to experience something different. The staff are v. friendly, Ishan was very knowledgeable about the area during our stay, and his service and help was excellent!

The location of the hotel is only a 10/15 minute walk into the town centre, there are a few bars to try, and plenty to see.

placeInfo/address: 31, St. Kilda's Lane, Marine Drive, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Opt for Signature Sea Facing Room
text:
The property is beautifully located right on the Marine drive, in front of the Indian Ocean. We had booked the Signature Sea Facing room and the room was even BETTER than what I had seen in the photos. Spacious, clean and a gorgeous view of the Ocean, the hotel has it all. The staff went out of their way to ensure that we had a comfortable stay. Special thanks to Mr. Inshaf, Front Desk Executive, who took care of even our smallest need. I travelled along with my Mum and sister, and all of us were deeply satisfied with our stay.
Important Information for anyone reading this:
1. There are 3 restaurants in the hotel ( a cafe, a buffet/ a la carte restaurant and a rooftop bar cum restaurant) and food options are plenty. The food is really good and comes at a reasonable price (as compared to other places that we explored).
2. The staff is extremely courteous and even arranges for sightseeing tours at different price. If anyone is taking a trip to Kandy, Pinawalla or Galle, ask for Mr. Udeesha. He is the best. We made two full day trips with him and honestly, it was the safest and warmest experience we have had ever.
3. The washrooms are clean and regular housekeeping is maintained.
4. While booking, select the sea facing rooms. It comes at a higher price than other rooms but definitely worth every penny.
5. Options for breakfast buffet is available. The spread is good 👍🏻
title: Best stay in Colombo, undoubtedly!

The rooms had large glass pane windows with uninterrupted views of the ocean, right across the hotel.
There is plunge pool on the rooftop, which ahits at 6 PM, as the bar funstions here post that time. So , plan to go before that or in the morning. You can enjoy a geeatview from the pool and relax.

text: Recent visit to the hotel is a perfect stay.  Hotel has a clean  large garden with greens facing the lagoon. When you walk around the garden landscaping is different from place to place. Room is spacious with all nessacities and privacy. They provided us a room specially designed for a elderly when told them that my mother also coming with us. She is 92 year old and had a safe stay. Thank you very much. Buffet has enough varieties and even a vegan can leave with full stomach. Food is tasty. Deserts included several varieties. Staff is very good and ready to help at any moment. Nothing to grumble. When we wanted to find the way to the beach within the premises one boy excorted us voluntarily. text:
Отель очень понравился, вернулась бы сюда снова! 
Плюсы: 
Еда выше всяких похвал, прекрасный сервис, всегда приветливый персонал, готовый помочь с любым вопросом. Номера довольно аскетичные, но все удобства есть: кондиционер, телевизор, фен; уборка ежедневно. 
Много спортивных площадок на территории: волейбол, теннис, бадминтон, футбол - все что душе угодно.
Минус: рядом есть только один магазин с достаточно ограниченным выбором продуктов. 
Внутри отеля есть сувенирные лавки, при желании территорию можно даже не покидать. 
В шаговой доступности есть рестораны. 
На мой взгляд, отель подойдет всем: и любителям расслабленного отдыха, и тем, кто любит активности.
title: Чудесный отпуск на берегу Индийского океана

Dear Guest,

Thank you so much for your heartfelt and detailed review. We’re truly delighted to know that you and your husband chose to spend your December vacation with us and that your stay left you with such warm memories.

It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the comfort of our spacious bungalows, the variety and quality of our all-inclusive meals, and the beauty of our surroundings — from the gardens and friendly peacocks to the stunning sunsets by the sea. While the ocean can sometimes be too rough for swimming, we’re glad our large, multi-depth pool provided a relaxing alternative.

We’re also pleased to hear you made time to explore Sri Lanka with a trip to Nuwara Eliya and enjoyed the evening entertainment back at the hotel. Thank you for your kind words about our attentive and friendly team — they’ll be very happy to know they made a positive impact on your stay.

We do appreciate your feedback regarding the excursions and the unexpected extra charges at various stops, as well as your note about the long drive back. We’ll take this into account and pass it along to the relevant partners for future improvements.

Your kind recommendation means a great deal to us, and while we understand you usually don’t return to the same place twice, we would be thrilled to welcome you back someday.

Warmest regards,
Indika Athauda,
Front Office Executive.
placeInfo/address: Beach Rd, Marawila 61210 Sri Lanka
text:
Отдыхали с супругом в декабре 2024 года. Нам очень понравился отель, он состоит из 40 бунгало. Комната большая, всё есть для отличного отдыха. Комнату убирали каждый день. Питание всё включено - очень разнообразное, салаты, мясо, пирожные , мороженое всё супер вкусное. У отеля огромная территория, ходят павлины, вараны....
Море рядом , оно такое тёплое, красивое, очень красивые закаты. Но часто бывают волны и купаться нельзя. Но на территории есть огромный бассейн, он поделён на участки с разной глубиной. 
Ездили на экускусию в Нувара Элия  на два дня. В целом экскурсия понравилась. Не понравилось то, что на каждой остановке надо платить, то есть к слонам при ехали -заплати ,чтобы их покормить, к черепахам тоже самое) Об этом не предупреждают организаторы. И ещё нюанс. У нас был водитель и экскурсовод Рома-дома, ему было тяжело одному, на обратном пути он как-будто засыпал и приходилось его подбадривать всю дорогу. 
Вечерами была живая музыка или представление с танцами.... Понравилось вообще ВСЁ!!!!! Постоянно с тоской вспоминаю это умиротворенное , живописное место.... Не в моих правилах отдыхать в одном и том же месте, но сюда я бы еще вернулась! 
Обслуживающий персонал всегда улыбается и очень приветлив. Любые наши вопросы решались в сию минуту. 
Спасибо Вам за отдых! Буду рекомендовать своим друзьям!!
title: Спокойный отдых с релаксом!

We had a truly wonderful stay at Sheraton Kosgoda with my wife and our son. From the moment we arrived, the staff greeted us and treated us so kindly. The food was excellent with plenty of choice of tasty dishes to suit all tastes, and the dining experience was always good during our visit.

Another of our favorite experiences during our visit as a family was the indoor play area for children, "Little Hatchlings." It was well planned, clean, and full of engaging activities that our son was fascinated with for hours. Surprisingly, the staff even offered him a set of puzzles to solve, which added such a special and individual touch to the visit.

All in all, it was a nice and relaxing break. We thoroughly enjoyed the family environment and look forward to returning. Highly recommended for families who want comfort, great service, and fun for the kids.
title: Fun Filled Weekend at Sheraton Kosgoda

Dear Paul,

Thank you so much for sharing your unforgettable experience at Sheraton Kosgoda Turtle Beach Resort. We’re truly honored that you chose to celebrate your birthday with us, and even more delighted to know that our team helped make it a special and memorable occasion for you and your family.

Your heartfelt compliments mean the world to us. We’re especially pleased to hear that Nadja Dissanayaka made such a positive impact during your stay. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to him and the rest of the restaurant team, who will be thrilled to know their efforts stood out to you.

We're also grateful for your recognition of how our team handled the challenges you encountered during your stay. It’s our priority to respond to feedback quickly and effectively, and your acknowledgment is deeply appreciated.

Thank you as well for your honest feedback regarding the beach experience. While our beachfront is public, as is customary in Sri Lanka, we understand that guest comfort and privacy are paramount, and we are continually working on improving how we guide and support our guests in navigating such interactions.

It was a pleasure having you with us, and we’re so glad you left with such fond memories. We truly hope to welcome you and your family back for another wonderful holiday in the near future.

Warm regards,
Sahan Thabrew
placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
I spent a wonderful holiday at the Sheraton Kosgoda in Sri Lanka with my wife and son – and it was simply unforgettable! One of the highlights was celebrating my birthday during our stay. The hotel staff made it a truly special occasion with thoughtful touches and warm hospitality that really impressed us.

A very special thanks goes to our Guest Relations Officer, Mr. Nadja Dissanayaka. He was always approachable, extremely friendly, and handled all our requests with great care and professionalism. His personal attention made a real difference and is something you don’t experience every day.

We also want to express our appreciation for the restaurant staff – always courteous, attentive, and welcoming. The food was without a doubt the best all-inclusive experience we've ever had! The variety and quality were outstanding – something we definitely noticed on the scale afterwards 😉

During our stay, we did encounter a few challenges – which can happen anywhere. What stood out here, however, was the excellent way the hotel management handled these issues. Everything was addressed quickly and professionally. That kind of service truly sets this hotel apart.

The resort itself is beautiful, with modern, clean, and comfortable rooms. The pool area is great for relaxing, and the entire property is well maintained.

One small downside – which is typical across Sri Lanka – is that the hotel doesn't have a private beach. While beach access is easy and direct from the hotel, you may be approached by locals more frequently than you’d like, which some guests might find intrusive.

Bottom line: We had a fantastic time at the Sheraton Kosgoda and left with amazing memories. We highly recommend this hotel and would love to come back again!
title: Unforgettable Stay at Sheraton Kosgoda – Truly Exceptional!

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you very much for taking the time to share such a detailed and heartfelt review of your recent stay at Sheraton Kosgoda Turtle Beach Resort.

We’re delighted to know that you had a great experience and that our associates – especially Dilhara, Abdullah, and Dishan – made a lasting impression with their warmth, expertise, and genuine care. We’ll be sure to pass along your kind words to them; they will be thrilled to know they contributed to your memorable stay.

It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the variety and quality of our culinary offerings, and we truly value your feedback regarding food waste during the off-season. We are continuously working on optimizing our buffet operations to balance variety with sustainability.

We’re also pleased that you appreciated the spacious rooms, well-maintained pool, and the unique opportunity to witness turtle conservation just steps away from the resort.

Your constructive comments are equally appreciated – especially regarding the All-Inclusive beverage access and beach cleanliness. We take your feedback seriously and will explore ways to improve both these aspects for a more seamless and enjoyable guest experience.

Thank you again for choosing to stay with us. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future for another memorable seaside escape.

Warm regards,

placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Auf jeden Fall die Schildkröten Station besuchen. Ausflüge lassen sich super bei dem Touranbieter am Strand buchen. Viel günstiger als beim Reiseveranstalter.
text:
Wir hatten ein tolles Erlebnis mit dem Hotel.
Alle sind enorm freundlich.
Im Restaurant hatten wir mit Dilhara und Abdullah 2 Kellner die ihren Job in Perfektion beherrschen. Mich hat es enorm beeindruckt, dass sie zu Rückfragen zu Gerichten auch immer das Rezept parat hatten. Das wirkte nie auswendig gelernt. Tips für Ausflüge und auch was man dort vermeiden sollte gab es auch von den beiden. 
Das Essen war fantastisch. Die Auswahl war sehr groß, manchmal zu groß. Wir waren in der Nebensaison hier und nicht viel Gäste, da tat mir das im Herzen weh zu sehen was übrig bleibt. 
Die Zimmer sind groß und schön eingerichtet, das Bett hatte aber schon einige Gäste gesehen. 
Der Pool ist sehr groß und sehr gepflegt. Bei Dishan konnten wir uns immer Poolnudeln, Luftmatratze, Schildkröte Erika und Co. ausleihen, er war immer zum Spaß aufgelegt.
Was man optimieren könnte, mit All Inklusive hat man nur in 2 von 4 Bars die Möglichkeit etwas zu trinken. Die eine ist draußen, die andere im Restaurant. Bei Regen war das draußen nicht optimal, obwohl überdacht.  
50 Meter weiter am Strand findet man direkt die Schildkröten Station. Man kann die Schildkröten dort ins Meer lassen.  Ein Erlebnis an das man sich ein Leben lang erinnert.  Was aber wirklich etwas ist woran gearbeitet werden muss, die Sauberkeit am Strand.
title: Tolles Hotel, landestypisches Essen und herausragender Service.

placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
Nice hotel, we stayed at Sheraton 12 nights, spacious rooms, friendly and helpful staff, opulent breakfast, big swimming pool, most of rooms have sea view. Welcome ceremony for new guests. Last night we were offered by the hotel manager a High tea for free (probably because we stayed there so long), this made a memorable impression to us. Sandy beach just in front of the hotel, clean sea however big waves (April) even adults might have problems. The beach by the hotel is about 1Km wide,  nice and without rocks, however the whole coastline is rocky, almost no possibility to swim. I would say better beach is in Bentota (12 km away), however more people there. Anyway we were happy on the hotel’s beach, because we were almost alone and romantic scenery especially at sunset. Kosgoda is a small village with limited shop possibilities, modern supermarket cca. 500 meters away, ATM, some local grocery shops. We went also to Hikkaduwa beach, but were disappointed, too many people, hotels, rocks, no shade.
The excursions organized by the travel agency were quite expensive, we were lucky to meet Amal Perera by chance, he lives in Kosgoda and we went on two excursions together, Sinharaja rain forest and Udawalawe NP by car for a very reasonable price. Gives you fixed price in advance with no hidden costs. He is reliable, helpful, I can fully recommend, his cell number +94779125644.
title: Great hotel and stuff

Our stay was absolutely perfect from beginning to end. One of the highlights was enjoying breakfast in the peaceful garden with a stunning view of the lake – just as we had hoped. It was the perfect way to start each day.

The rooms were exceptionally clean, spacious, and tastefully decorated, offering everything we needed for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Throughout the entire house, you can feel the charming English flair, which adds a very special and cozy atmosphere.

The location is simply breathtaking – surrounded by nature, yet peaceful and quiet, making it an ideal spot to unwind and enjoy the beauty of the surroundings. We truly loved every moment of our stay and would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a tranquil and charming getaway.
title: Just Perfect

text:
From the moment we arrived at EKHO Lake House, we were blown away by the stunning location and warm hospitality. Nestled right by the Parakrama Samudra lake, the views are simply breathtaking—especially at sunrise and sunset. It’s the perfect place to relax after a day exploring the ancient ruins of Polonnaruwa.

The staff were incredibly attentive and friendly. Special thanks to Mr. Nuwan, the Resident Manager, for checking in on us personally and making sure everything was perfect. The service was truly five-star, and everyone from the reception to the restaurant went out of their way to make our stay memorable.

Our room was clean, spacious, and beautifully decorated, with a private veranda overlooking the lake. The food was delicious and beautifully presented—we especially enjoyed the Sri Lankan breakfast!

This is a must-visit spot if you’re in Polonnaruwa. We’ll definitely be back and will be recommending EKHO Lake House to all our friends and family. Thank you for an unforgettable stay!
title: A Peaceful Lakeside Gem in Polonnaruwa

placeInfo/address: Pothgul Mawatha, Polonnaruwa 51000 Sri Lanka
text:
This was my second visit to EKHO Lake and my impressions didn't change.

This is a great hotel - a small boutique hotel on the edge of the lake with great staff, service and ambience. It is also very  closely located to the ruins in Polonnaruwa.

Priyahntha Koralegedara (the Senior Guest Manager) was fantastic and did a great job looking after us.

We loved our big room with the big bed, great bathroom and separate dressing room.  The view out across the lake was stunning.

The food was fantastic - great Sri Lankan breakfast and the Sri Lankan curries for dinner were so tasty.  Spicy but not burning hot ........ great food.

It is worth staying a few nights here to explore the surrounding countryside.  

Amd remember that the late Queen Elizabeth and Prince Phillip stayed here for their honeymoon. We got a tour of her suite - wish I could afford it !!!!!!!
title: EKHO Lake - stay like a Queen.

text: Beautiful hotel and view; outstanding service; and delicious food. We stayed as a family of 4 and the staff were all lovely and couldn’t do enough for us; even showing my son how to fish. The food was all fantastic- especially their Lake House Curry and Sri Lankan Breakfast; but there were lots of choices for our fussy kids too. My husband had an amazing Balinese massage and my daughter and I had spa treatments from lovely Amy, which were great. The manager Priyantha was also kind enough to show us the Royal Suite where Queen Elizabeth stayed in 1954 - complete with gold bath! Great location too; right on the historic Kumara Potuna royal bathing site with stunning views of the lake. Don’t hesitate to book this wonderful hotel.
title: Beautiful hotel; great location; delicious food and outstanding service.

placeInfo/address: 25 Galle Face Center Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka
text:
We stayed at Taj Samudra, Colombo, and while the property has its strengths, it didn’t quite match the experience we had at Taj Bentota.

The location is convenient, right in the heart of Colombo and just across from the beach—though it’s important to note that you have to cross a busy road to reach the shore, so it’s not as private or serene as some other Taj properties.

The pool was decent, but felt a bit underwhelming after the stunning one at Taj Bentota. On the plus side, the food was  good, and a special mention goes to the passion fruit jam at breakfast—absolutely delightful!

Our room was neat and comfortable, though we missed having a balcony, especially in a coastal city. Also, the lawns and outdoor areas felt a bit neglected, not quite up to the usually impeccable Taj standards.

In summary, Taj Samudra offers good service and a prime city location, but could benefit from some updates and better outdoor maintenance to truly live up to the Taj brand.
title: Exploring new horizons 🇱🇰🎊✨️

The food served during the event was absolutely delicious – every dish was perfectly prepared, beautifully presented, and received high praise from all our guests. A special thanks to Chef Niranjan, whose culinary expertise truly made the evening memorable. His attention to detail and creativity were evident in every food.

Equally impressive was the exceptional service provided by Banquet Manager Chaminda and his team. From planning to execution, Chaminda ensured every element of the event ran smoothly. His professionalism, responsiveness, and calm coordination played a big part in the event’s success.

The hotel staff as a whole were courteous, helpful, and went out of their way to ensure everything exceeded our expectations.

Thank you to the entire team for making the Asia Miracle Awards a night to remember. I highly recommend this venue for any special event or celebration – you will not be disappointed!

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. We greatly appreciate your feedback, as it helps us improve and create a memorable stay for our guests.

We are thrilled to know you enjoyed the spacious room and bathroom, as well as the breathtaking sunrise view from your balcony. It’s wonderful that the lush greenery and the delightful presence of birds and squirrels added to your experience. We're also pleased that our reception staff and restaurant team provided you with friendly and kind service.

We acknowledge your concerns regarding certain aspects of your stay, such as the coffee stains and cracks on the cement table which we have started to address already with suitable replacement. The cleanliness of utensils provided in the room is taken with utmost serious by our Team and we have taken necessary steps to ensure that it will not be repeated again. Regular maintenance is indeed vital, and we will ensure these areas receive prompt attention. The feedback regarding the burners in the restaurant and the lingering aroma of food is noted, and we are committed to addressing these matters to enhance your dining experience.

Your insights are invaluable, and we will work diligently to resolve these issues and provide the exceptional service and environment we strive for.

We hope to welcome you back in the future, where you can see the improvements firsthand and enjoy an even better stay.

Warm regards,
placeInfo/address: 84, Nilaveli Road 3rd Mile Post, Trincomalee, Trincomalee 31000 Sri Lanka
text:
New hotel and still in the process of bigger units almost completed.
Reception staff were helpful, kind and quick at work.
Huge property close to a beach.
Room and bathroom are spacious. Enjoyed my cup of coffee with the view of a beautiful Sunrise outside at the balcony!
Concrete cement is used as table in the room.  There are cracks already and the coffee stain of coffee from cups on it are evident.  If regular maintenance is ignored, this property will lose its charm.  So ensure attention is given.
Spoon and cup that I wanted to use was oily, need to be washed thoroughly.
Birds, squirrel in the balcony garden with the the lush greenery was a plus!
Restaurant food was plenty.  But the problem was the burners were not lite and this caused the chafing dishes to be cold.  I told the staff there, but nothing was done and I left without taking food from the chafing dishes.  Staff at the restaurant were friendly and kind.  The restaurant needs ventilation to keep away the aroma of food lingering on clothes after visit to the restaurant.
title: Uppuveli Beach By Dsk, Trincomalee, Sri Lanka

text: We visited Shangri-la Hambantota resort and Spa during our vacation to Sri Lanka. This resort is amazingly hands down the best resort in Sri Lanka. We have visited many resorts in many countries and this hotel is in par with the other top resort in the world. We were in Ocean View Suite and the room is size of a 2 bedroom apartment with amazing views and swings. The best thing to remember is how friendly and supportive the staff is. Starting from the reception, room service, pool, restaurant and even the staff who are not customer facing are so friendly.  Out of all Kanishka in Bojunhala restaurant is the BEST. I need to mention him as he was very kind, supportive and friendly. Keep up the good work and smile always. And to mention the food is very tasty. They had a wide variety of food selection with many action stations. Chef Ladies in the hoppers station are very friendly. There are 3 massive pools and the best part is kids pool if you have little kids. While we were here we had amazing experiences and treatment. We will definitely visit here again.
title: Best Resort in South Asia!!!

1. die "Hardware": das Hotel hat während unseres Aufenthalts gerade seinen 9. Geburtstag gefeiert. Für ein Hotel dieses Alters ist es in einem sehr guten Zustand und wird ständig renoviert und instandgehalten.
Zimmer:
Die Suite ist mit 96m² sehr groß, hat ein tolles Wohn- und Esszimmer, ein Schlafzimmer, Ankleide, und ein Bad mit Badewanne und Dusche. Doch das Beste an der Suite ist der unglaubliche Ausblick vom 3.Stock aus (Level 4) auf den Adults-only-Pool, den tollen Garten und das Meer.- einfach perfekt.
Hotel:
Das Haus hat 2 Flügel mit Zimmern  mit der Lobby in der Mitte. Alles ist elegant und großzügig.
Garten: 
Der Garten (Meerseitig) ist eins der vielen Highlights des Hotetels:
Er ist sehr gepflegt mit einem Adults-only-Pool, dem Lagoon-Pool, einem Kinderpool, einem Wasser-Erlebnis-Bereich, und vielen anderen Aktivitäten. 
Auf der Landseite befindet sich der hauseigene 18-Loch-Golfplatz, traumhaft gepflegt, ein Muß, auch wenn man nicht Golf spielt.
Restaurants:
Buffetrestaurant: Bujunhala:
Das Hauptrestaurant ist recht groß und dadurch nicht ganz gemütlich. Eine Unterteilung mit leichten Stoffen würde hier schon mehr Atmosphäre schaffen. Sehr liebevoll gestalteter Kinderbereich mit eigenem Minis-Buffet.
Hier wird sowohl das Frühstück, was sehr gut ist, als auch das Abendliche Dinner-Buffet serviert. 
Alacarte-Restaurant Sera: gemütliches Restaurant, 
Cocktaillounge Gimanhala: das Gimanhala wurde leider die ersten Tage unseres Aufenthalts umgebaut/renoviert.  Nach Wiedereröffnung durften wir hier den High-Tea geniessen.
Golfclub und Bar Ulpatha:
Ein echtes "Schmankerl": direkt am Golfplatz genießt man hier einen Cocktail bei Sonnenuntergang, aber auch tolle moderne Küche. Gegen 16:00 schaut dann auch der ein oder andere Pfau auf der Terrasse vorbei und geht mit den Gästen auf Tuchfühlung.

2. Die "Software":
Uns ist wieder die  Freundlichkeit und der Professionalität aller Mitarbeiter aufgefallen.
Herausragend war Navindu im Restaurant Bojunhala, der -trotz teilweise viel Trubel- immer freundlichst und aufmerksam war, wie wir es sonst nur in der Spitzengastronomie gewohnt  sind.
Auch der Koch Dilan hat uns sehr mit seiner tollen Küche verwöhnt.
Im Ulpatha wurden wir speziell vom dortigen Teamleiter mit aussergewöhnlichem Service umsorgt. 
Danke an dieser Stelle, auch an das gesamte Team.
title: Urlaub im Paradies

text:
Spent a couple of nights here as part of a tour group,  lazing around in resorts is not really our thing but it was a bit isolated and we had, had a busy few days before so got into the resort mode (including sunburn) lazed around the pool reading.

Complex is pretty impressive with several good eating and drinking options, though for Sri Lanka a little on the expensive side but guess what you get in a "luxury" resort.

Service generally good though one day at 4:45pm room still not made up so chased that up as we wanted new towels.

If you want a good resort on the beach to laze around for a day or two this is a good option if you are in the region.
title: Great resort to laze around

text:
Shangri‑La Golf Hotel Resort & Spa Hambantota Team,

I am writing to express my sincere appreciation for the outstanding experience my family and I enjoyed during our recent stay at your resort. From the moment we arrived, the warm welcome and genuine care shown by your front office team set the tone for a truly memorable holiday.

Throughout our stay, every member of your staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. The F&B team at your restaurant delighted us each day with an impressive variety of delicious dishes—every meal was beautifully presented and bursting with flavor. We especially enjoyed the local specialties, and appreciated how attentive the servers were in recommending new items and accommodating our requests.

Our room was immaculately maintained, with all facilities in perfect working order. The housekeeping staff paid meticulous attention to detail, ensuring our space was always pristine and inviting. Equally noteworthy was the spotless condition of the entire resort: the sparkling pool areas, lush gardens, and common areas all reflected your commitment to cleanliness and excellence.

We would also like to extend our gratitude to the management team for regularly checking in on us to make sure we were enjoying our stay. Your proactive approach and genuine interest in our comfort did not go unnoticed and made us feel truly valued as guests.

Thank you once again for crafting such a wonderful experience. We look forward to returning to Shangri‑La Hambantota and will gladly recommend your resort to friends and family.
title: Heartfelt Thanks for an Exceptional Stay at Shangri‑La Hambantota

text:
Really warm experience my wife and I had in the near past. Such degree of comfort, freedom and hospitality I have only felt at my home. Every aspect of your needs in terms of relaxing is looked in to. If you’re a family with kids or adults who wish to travel alone or a couple who what’s to relax. This is the place to be.
The staff are always with a smile and eager to help out. All waiting staff at the buffet Bojunhala are such a welcoming lot. Working so hard like busy bees to attend to every need of its guests. You see how tired they are but never forget to smile and offer a helping hand should you need it. Out of all the lovely waiting staff, KANISHKA is the one to lookout for. He stands out above the rest with his friendly nature and going an extra mile to satisfy his customers. 
A little tip for whoever reading this. If you want to relax and enjoy peace and a real holiday I suggest you come here during the off season.
title: A Experience to remember at Shangrila Hambanthota

text:
Dear Mr. Chamara and Mr. Chaminda,

I’m Mohan Gunasekera, a committee member of the 94’ Batch Birthday Bash – President’s College Kotte. We recently celebrated our 50th Birthday Get-Together on Saturday, 28th of June at the Winchester Hall, Kingsbury Hotel.

I wish to extend my heartfelt appreciation to both of you for the exceptional support and coordination you provided as Operations Managers in charge of the event. Everything was executed seamlessly and right on time, without any delays. All the last-minute requests and changes that arose during the evening were handled efficiently and with great professionalism.

A special word of thanks also goes to the stewarding staff on duty that evening. Their service was outstanding throughout the event. In particular, the bartender who attended to us that night deserves high praise for the excellent service delivered.

On behalf of the organizing committee, I take this opportunity to express our sincere gratitude to the entire team – the banquet captain, banquet operations managers, and the stewarding staff – for your contribution in making the evening a memorable success.

Thank you once again.

Warm regards,
Mohan Gunasekera
Committee Member – 94’ Batch Birthday Bash

text:
The Kingsbury was a really great stay. Staff is very welcoming and attentive, from the doormen to the front desk, waitstaff, and house keeping, staff is very good. We especially enjoyed Avishka’s (hope I spelled his name right!) service. Such a pleasant person with exceptional service. The front desk staff was very accommodating of our strange scheduled stay, as we spent our first and third week in Sri Lanka at this hotel. We are very grateful for the arrangements they made for us. 

My one gripe is that the one time we really wanted to order indoor dining/room service, as I was not feeling well from a long day of being out. It took a long time for the staff to bring up the QR code for me to even order food, and that’s after I had to call a second time 20ish minutes later to see if they’d brought it. By the time I ordered and was told it would be there in 20 minutes, almost an hour and a half passed, in which I was not really hungry by that point. Other than that, I would certainly stay here again and for an extended stay.
title: Coming Back!

text: We love this hotel and have stayed here several times.  A fantastic 5 star hotel with beautiful reception area, piano player, cafe/bakery for high tea, coffee, cakes and savouries, many amazing restaurants including seafood, steak, Chinese and Japanese, roof top bar, stunning pool area and bar.  The restaurant for buffet breakfast and dinner is huge with unbelievable wide selection of eastern and western food - outstanding food and choice.  The suite rooms are large and very comfortable with lounge area and great views.  The hotel is walking distance to 1 Galle Face shopping centre, Galle Face Green and Hotel and Dutch Hospital restaurants, bars and shops.  We like the location at the other end of Galle Face Green near the port as it is quiet and away from the busy centre.  Our favourite hotel in Colombo.
title: Best hotel in Colombo

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Lots of parking space available if needed.
text:
We needed somewhere for just one night and this proved to be a really good choice.
It is a modernised and modified older bungalow set in its own grounds which are well maintained.
The room was spacious and very comfortable with a good attached bathroom providing everything you might need.
The staff are extremely helpful and welcoming.
The breakfast is served in a lovely modern dining area with views into the garden. The food was ordered from a menu and was delicious.
I would definitely recommend this hotel if you're looking for a small quiet place away from the noisy centre.
The only slight downside of the particular room we had was that once the window blind was  lifted the room  felt quite open to anyone walking past on the path outside. However that was no big deal.
title: Lovely small hotel in Nuwara Eliya.

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
text: Fantastic rustic charm in an old England style boutique hotel. Lovely surroundings and great staff. Food was wonderful too. Only issue was their online system which didn't pick up the booking from Booking.com and their payment system didn't work, meant we had to go into the town and withdraw cash from an ATM to pay. Not really a problem if you've paid in advance. Wouldn't let that stop us from going back. Lovely place.

Your kind words about the setting — nestled between palm trees, lagoons, and the breathtaking Indian Ocean — truly capture the essence of what makes our resort special. placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
We stayed for 4 wonderful nights at the Sheraton Kosgoda on the west coast of Sri Lanka. It was the perfect spot to relax after a fabulous tour around Sri Lanka with On the go tours.
The hotel was built five years ago and is nestled between Palm trees and  lagoons with a wonderful beachfront with wonderful sunsets across the Indian Ocean. Darshi Peiris was our awesome guest services manager who made sure we have a nice front facing junior suite and also recommended a private dining anniversary celebration on the beach. Darshi looped in the sous chef so I was able to plan a bespoke sea food supper and we even saw a hatchling turtle join us at supper on its way down for its first every swim - amazing experience and I wondered if Darshi also waved her magic want to arrange the hatchling?!
The poolside is very well managed and beautifully cleaned by the outdoor team and we enjoyed the Olive pool bar for lunch and drinks.
Restaurant S serves a great breakfast buffet and supper is available a very comprehensive buffet.  We do find the evening buffet too large so preferred a la Carte but some some nights they did not offer it in the S restaurante so we have to eat super at Olive which is limited. The a la carte did have delicious Sri Lankan traditional curries which were loved.
The gym team did early morning Joga and stretch classes and the only suggestion would be take advantage of the wonderful outdoor areas and offer a qualified Yoga Class which we would happily pay for. The beach or roof terraces would be a great setting for sunrise yoga. 
Hats off to darshi for really looking after us and making our stay truly memorable. We look forward to coming back.
Ian + Alyson
title: Amazing setting and guest services team

ownerResponse/text:

placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Don't miss.
text:
Hi,

I was a part of Rishabh Parakh’s team which was in your hotel from 17th to 21st April 2025. Our entire team was hosted by you and your entire wonderful team at Sheraton Beach Resort Kosgoda.

We had an amazing stay at your resort. The location and the view from the property is just breath-taking. 

The food was simply excellent, very tasty. Breakfast was very lavish. The ambience was absolutely amazing, and it just lifted our spirits. The rooms were spacious and very clean. The room service whenever called, was very prompt, which is what you want actually. 

When I was carrying my colleague’s kid and also had 2 plates of breakfast in hand, seeing that Kalpani came running to carry the plates so I could carry the kid conveniently. It just shows the amount of passion for the profession that she has and the service levels she wants to keep. Not to forget Dilki and Tharumani who used to welcome us at the door of S Kitchen with a bright smile, always willing to help you find the right place to sit for breakfast.
Also Robison came to collect our baggage from our rooms. He was like ever smiling and happy to do his job. This pleasant behavior gives positive vibes and leaves a nice feeling. 

Another incident worth mentioning is that one of our colleagues had misplaced his backpack at the lobby one evening and only realized it the next morning. So after inquiring at the reception, they said they will call back once they have located. But after a couple of hours, we got a little anxious and that time it was Irshaad at the reception, and he overheard our conversation with the reception person. He immediately jumped into the conversation and asked us a few questions, rushed inside and came out with the backpack.   

So all in all we had an amazing experience. The entire team is motivated and enthusiastic to go over and beyond to give that experience to guests. Most definitely this will be our first place of stay when we go next time again.
title: What an experience !!!! Amazing.

text:
A simple “thank you” doesn't do justice to the incredible experience my wife and I had at Sheraton Kosgoda Turtle Beach Resort. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with warmth and hospitality that made our stay truly memorable.

We were part of a group trip organized by Mr. Rishabh Raj Parakh, with a total of 11 rooms booked, and the resort team went above and beyond to ensure everything was seamless and enjoyable for everyone. The attention to detail, friendly service, and thoughtful gestures made all the difference.

From the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed in the traditional Sri Lankan way by Udesh, Irshad, and Dilshan at the front office. Their hospitality and efficiency ensured we had a smooth and quick check-in, setting a positive tone for the rest of our stay.

The food throughout our stay was exceptional. The chefs were kind enough to cater to every customized request we made, and everything was delicious. Special thanks to the restaurant team — Tharumini, Raveen, Kalhara, and Imashi — who not only served with smiles but also managed to arrange our seating on short notice with such grace.

Housekeeping also deserves a big round of applause. Our room was consistently clean, comfortable, and beautifully arranged — thanks to Denuwan, Ishara, Kasun, and Chambodi. Your attention to detail truly made a difference.

To the entire team under the leadership of Mr. Mano Gunasekera  (General Manager  at Sheraton Kosgoda) : Thank you for your warmth, dedication, and care. You’ve given us memories we will cherish for a lifetime. We can’t wait to return!

placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text:
Удачный отель для тех, кто любит спокойный отдых. Нам понравилось что нет шумной анимации, только аква-аэробика ближе к обеду. В обе стороны простирается дикий пляж, очень красиво вокруг, можно много гулять по пляжу. В отеле очень хорошо кормят, приветливый персонал. Если не берёте по системе все включено, то достаточно проблематично покушать где-то поблизости, нужно ехать в Бентоту. Нам понравилось в ресторане beach club, но туда тоже надо ехать на тук-туке.
 Номера в нормальном состоянии. Приветливый персонал. 
Также мы брали экскурсии у местного агента Банду. Очень комфортно довез до сафари и Эллы на новой тойоте королла с кондиционером. Проходили в своем комфортном темпе все достопримечательности. По цене вышло выгоднее чем у туроператоров. Искренне рекомендую, его номер +94 77 783 6537. 
У отеля много живности, видели варанов, бурундуков, разных птиц, следы черепах, которые вызолл до чт ночью откладывать яйца. 
Рекомендую отель как для отдыха с парой, так и с детьми.
title: Отдых в апреле 2025

roomTip:
荷物が来るのが遅くて
20分以上かかったので、自分で運んだ方が良い。
text:
快適で、清潔。
一人で泊まって安心です。

目の前が海で、地中海なので
眺めがよいです。

列車もとおり、
ドアがなく、通過時間は、ドアにくっついて落ちないのかと、珍しい物見れて楽しかった。

水もボトルに入って
たくさんで、オシャレ。

歯ブラシはついてないけと、
シャンプーとボビーソープは、
シャワーの横にボタン方式でたくさんつかえてます^ ^

リンスはないよ。

パジャマもないです。

朝食は、普通だけど、
2日泊まりましたが、スープが違い、嬉しい。

ドレッシングは、言わないと出してもらえない。

ドリップコーヒーは、別料金。

コーヒーも紅茶も自分でいれます。

お湯も快適、トイレも綺麗。
静かで、ホテルの方
泊まっているかた親切でした。

安心安全綺麗で
大満足です。
title: 清潔安全安心ホテル

But the icing on the cake was staying in the first bungalow right next to the pool and the beach, it was paradise!

placeInfo/address: 84, Nilaveli Road 3rd Mile Post, Trincomalee, Trincomalee 31000 Sri Lanka
roomTip:
Check out when at Uppuveli Beach.
Pigeon Island Snorkeling
Wreck Diving
Triconeshwar Temple Visit
Night Dining local fare in Trinco town
text: A brand new hotel run by an experienced staff with beach access rooms and in the perfect location - all these together are hard to come by. And yet, this is what the Uppuveli Beach Hotel offers. The infinity pool standing right on the Uppuveli beach is one of the best. Boat launch for activities out at sea such as snorkeling and diving starts at Uppuveli beach and it is just a few feet away from your room. Trincomalee town is close by and local sightseeing is easily arranged through the hotel or on your own. The bar is well stocked and the restaurant offers excellent local fare. The rooms are good sized with plush interiors and plenty of space around in the hotel grounds for kids to play. I think this is the best hotel in the area.
title: Wonderful brand new hotel in Uppuveli

placeInfo/address: 84, Nilaveli Road 3rd Mile Post, Trincomalee, Trincomalee 31000 Sri Lanka

But what stood out the most for us was how wonderful the staff were. Emran the Manager at Front Desk and Roshan were ever so helpful. Luxon, Arun at F&B were so friendly and always with a smile. All the staff made us feel very welcomed. 5 stars for a beautiful resort and excellent customer service!
title: Beautiful resort and very nice rooms

Your appreciation of our culinary offerings and the serene ambiance inspires us to continue providing the highest level of service. We’re also thrilled that you had the chance to explore the rich history of Polonnaruwa, which makes this destination so unique.

EKHO Lake House Polonnaruwa
placeInfo/address: Pothgul Mawatha, Polonnaruwa 51000 Sri Lanka
text:
EKHO Lake House Polonnaruwa is a true sanctuary of peace and luxury. Located on the shores of the magnificent Parakrama Samudra, the hotel boasts stunning panoramic views that instantly put you at ease. The property beautifully combines modern comforts with the charm of Sri Lanka’s rich history, making it the perfect retreat for travelers seeking both relaxation and cultural exploration.

The rooms are elegantly designed, spacious, and well-equipped, offering a sense of comfort and sophistication. The attentive staff go above and beyond to ensure every guest feels special, providing impeccable service with genuine warmth. Dining here is a culinary delight, with the restaurant serving a variety of delicious dishes prepared with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients.

Whether you’re enjoying a quiet moment by the lake, exploring the ancient ruins of Polonnaruwa nearby, or simply soaking in the serene ambiance, EKHO Lake House leaves a lasting impression. It’s an ideal choice for couples, families, or solo travelers looking for an unforgettable experience. Highly recommended for anyone visiting this historic region!
title: Wow!

placeInfo/address: Pothgul Mawatha, Polonnaruwa 51000 Sri Lanka
text:
My sister and I stayed at EKHO Lake House for two nights and were blown away by the tranquillity and peaceful atmosphere. The hotel’s rich history, especially the Royal Suite, added a unique charm. 

We spent a lot of time at the hotel, simply because the view was so beautiful and relaxing. 

We enjoyed a calming Ayurvedic massage in our room, which the hotel kindly arranged through a third party. The manager was also incredibly helpful, organizing a tuk-tuk tour of the ancient city, which allowed us to see many fascinating historical sites. The hotel's location is perfect and right at the heart of these sites 

The food was a nice mix of Asian and Western dishes, all fresh and delicious. The service was exceptional, especially from Arun, who made our stay even more enjoyable. His hospitality was outstanding and his cocktail-making skills are not to be missed! Particularly his Piña Colada! 

The pool and restaurant quickly became our favorite spots to unwind, especially with the wildlife around. I regularly spotted eagles, pelicans, beautiful butterflies, chipmunks and even an occasional toque macaque.

If you are looking for a serene escape with great service and a convenient location, I highly recommend EKHO Lake House!
title: Serene escape!

Die buddhistische Zeremonie, an der Sie teilnehmen durften, spiegelt die authentischen kulturellen Erlebnisse wider, die wir unseren Gästen gerne ermöglichen.

Die positive Resonanz zu unserem vielfältigen All-Inclusive-Angebot und der reichhaltigen Auswahl an vegetarischen Speisen bestätigt unseren hohen gastronomischen Standard. Die einzigartige Lage unseres Resorts, wo der Bentota-Fluss auf den Indischen Ozean trifft, schafft perfekte Bedingungen für entspannte Momente am Wasser.

Wir freuen uns sehr darauf, Sie bei Ihrem nächsten Besuch in Sri Lanka wieder bei uns begrüßen zu dürfen.
Mit herzlichen Grüßen

The Management
placeInfo/address: Kaluwamodara, Beruwala 12070 Sri Lanka
text:
Wir durften 8 Tage im Hotel Eden verbringen. Wir wurden von der 1 Minute an bis zur Abreise vom sehr freundlichen und aufmerksamen Personal umsorgt. Besonders erwähnen möchten wir den Barkeeper Shameera und Eashani. Mit Ihr durften wir an einer Buddhistischen-Zermonie im Hotel teilnehmen. War eine sehr tolle Erfahrung, danke dir Eashani und dem ganzen Hotel. Wir hatten All-Inklusiv gebucht und wir können das Buffet nur empfehlen. Auch für Vegetarier ist genügend Auswahl vorhanden. In den Indischen Ozean fliesst auf der Höhe des Hotels der Fluss Bentota was das Wasser nicht so salzig macht. Planschen möglich.
Unser Fazit vom Aufenthalt in Sri Lanka; wir waren zum 1. Mal hier aber bestimmt nicht zum Letzten Mal. Das Hotel und das Land sind zu 100% empfehlenswert.
title: Wunderschöner Urlaubsort

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,
We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience of your recent visit to Occidental Eden Beruwala, A Member Of Barcelo Hotel Group.

Your comments mean a great deal to us, and we value your comprehensive review of your experience.

We extend our sincere apologies for the initial accommodation that did not meet your expectations and the subsequent bathroom maintenance issue. Our maintenance team has addressed these concerns to prevent future occurrences. The beachfront location, while picturesque, does experience natural tidal patterns and currents typical of river mouth areas, and we prioritize guest safety in our recommendations regarding water activities.

We are delighted that our team could promptly resolve the situation by providing you with an upgraded accommodation. The spacious suite with its premium amenities truly represents our commitment to guest comfort. Our culinary team takes great pride in preparing exceptional dishes for both breakfast and dinner service, and we are pleased these exceeded your expectations.

Finally, it brings us joy that you found tranquility by our swimming pool after your extensive travels, and that our attentive staff members delivered the high standard of service we strive to maintain.

We would be honored to welcome you back for another rejuvenating stay.
Best regards,

The Management
placeInfo/address: Kaluwamodara, Beruwala 12070 Sri Lanka
text:
The Eden was our 7th & final hotel in our tour of Sri Lanka before we departed home. 

We arrived to a warm welcome by the staff. When we were shown to our room, we found it to be slightly dated & it felt like a bit of an anticlimax from what we’d been used to during our trip to Sri Lanka. 

We realised quickly that the bath/shower set up leaked all over the bathroom floor. I raised this with reception & asked to move rooms. We then received an upgrade & the upgraded room was brilliant, it was like a completely different hotel. The staff couldn’t have done any more for us with regards to resolving this issue. 

The upgraded room was spacious & immaculately presented. The food during our evening meals & breakfast was fantastic. 

It was great to wind down & relax around the pool area after 10 days of travelling. 

The beach area was accessible, but the beach is situated on the mouth of a river. Probably not the most hygienic to be swimming in, the sea is notoriously choppy a lot of the time with strong currents from the river so it was sensible not to go any further than a paddle. 

Overall, we really enjoyed our time at Eden. Thank you for a lovely stay.
title: Lovely hotel, helpful staff.

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: By our own (long and rather extensive) travel experience Chimneys are highly recommended. This is all to be said.
text:
We have fully enjoyed our two night stay at Chimneys. We were lucky being there at the low season. Can not imagine any better place to stay and enjoy Nuwara Eliya alongside with the true and exceptional hospitality. Very well managed place and it is worth every penny. Freshly renovated. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Internet working perfect. Food is exceptional. The whole Team is working hard to meet customers requirements. Highly recommending Chimneys to anyone looking for a peaceful heritage atmosphere and a treat at the best. 
Many thanks to the whole Team.

title: Excellent !

placeInfo/address: No 17 Bloomfield Rd, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka

text: The hotel situated just minutes away from most activities in Nuwara Eliya have probably the best staff you can expect. The simple extras they offered made a world of a difference. The lounge area is super nice with a lovely fire place to have a drink and relax.

text: Exceptionally outstanding property that has been done up very tastefully …. A reminder of British heritage ; nostalgia of my growing up in an army background . I was overwhelmed by the hospitality , good food , meticulously service , a small treasured  library , cosy fireplace and a list of endless happy experiences  & a lot of warmth in the place . The vibe is so heavenly ;  got a chance to speak to the Chairman of the property Mr. Devan DeMel … couldn’t hold back myself to express my gratitude for adding such a beautiful memory to our visit to Sri Lanka .   Highly recommended .
title: Extravagantly Outstanding Experience

roomTip: I never had a request that wasn’t fulfilled…  reflects that my needs aren’t onerous but also that the service at the Taj really is fantastic
text:
Everything catered for and service that went above and beyond the call of duty.  Check in experience saved by the wonderful Chaminda who ensured my room was great and then proceeded to suggest where I needed to go for the product manufacturers I was looking for and found me the right driver for the job - Sampath.  As I always travel alone for business I also enjoyed my daily chat with Chaminda who was always keen to see how things were going. 

Sampath went so far as to attend meetings (at my invitation) with me so that he could translate when required and had then provided an invaluable follow up service. 

If I could package the caring nature and service of these two, I’d package it up and recommend it to business customers. 

Whilst the Taj in Bentota was a more modern and better appointed hotel, the service at both properties was truly memorable.
title: Truly memorable business product sourcing trip

A special shoutout to Mr Karan Maini and team for making the stay special and one of the best we have had.

Thanks again for everything. We had a great time and hope to return soon.

Left with good memories. Would happily come back.
