placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
text:
After a 3 week tour of Sri Lanka we booked 3 nights at Calamansi Cove
The villa we had (Mango) was beautiful with a private garden area to relax and listen to the tropical sounds around.
Everywhere was spotlessly clean around the resort.
Lovely meals in the restaurant….some have mentioned slow service…we have waited longer in restaurants in the U.K….Whats the rush anyway when you can sit and enjoy a cold beer and delight in the beautiful surroundings. ( maybe some soft music would add a nice ambiance)
Stunning beach on your doorstep and fun watching the fishermen taking their boats out ( from 5pm ish) daily and also pulling in their catch with the nets.
The pool was great to cool off and must mention the lifeguard who we loved chatting to and explained lots about the nature of the area.
Also Asela who gives the most wonderful massages while listening to the sound of the ocean.
But a shout out to all the staff from the gardeners to the receptionist..Nirodha who,s communication is exceptional..Thank you.
Would we visit again?….In a heartbeat ….3 days was not long enough..
This place is truly paradise !
title: Paradise

ownerResponse/text:
Thankyou for your stay and this feedback. We have now rectified the privacy issue on the villa by building a higher wall.  
Best wishes
placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
roomTip: If you want privacy then don't take the villa named Rambutan.
text:
The property is away from crowded areas, near a village, about a kilometer from the main road. We stayed here for only one day/night and it was raining most of the time. We had our own car, hence it was convenient to go out otherwise we would be stuck here because of the rain. 

Our garden villa(named Rambutan) was nice and spacious. It is set in a tropical forest with a huge outdoor area and rooftop terrace. But mosquitoes wouldn't let us sit outside. The problem with our villa was that other guests could look into our room when they were passing by. So we had to keep the curtains down. I wouldn't recommend this villa.
The food at the restaurant was alright but expensive. The service was pretty slow. For dinner, one has to confirm hours before and for breakfast one has to order the night before.
The pool was good and the beach was excellent. There is a fishing village right next door.  Pretty idyllic!
If you want privacy then don't take the villa named Rambutan.
title: Nice little property on a great beach.

placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
text: Выражаем огромную благодарность Сотрудникам и Владельцам отеля! Место волшебное. Уютные, уединенные номера с отдельным входом и двориком. Наше утро начиналось с прекрасного завтрака на личной террасе в компании «семьи» обезьянок (мирные), под ненавязчивый аккомпанемент птичьего пения ☀️ к слову, время завтрака, место (садик при номере или ресторан) и блюда - на выбор гостей и без доплат. Кухня европейская, по-желанию, ланкийская. Шеф-повар профи 😉 все блюда очень вкусно приготовлены, учитывал все пожелания. Персонал отеля очень вежливый, тактичный, доброжелательный. В номерах, на территории отеля чистота и порядок! ✨А какие закаты и рассветы… мммм😻  Отдельное Спасибо спасателю отеля - всегда деликатно смотрит где гости, все ли безопасно. Океан 🌊 - буйная вещь, но отель расположен в уникальной локации, где больших волн и штормов практически нет, опасных морских обитателей нет совсем . Бухта защищена рифом. На территорию иногда приходят вараны (мирные), мило греются на дереве рядом с бассейном. 🦎Огромная Благодарность Ниро (администратор) все пожелания, консультации на высшем уровне 👍🏼 Теперь если отпуск на Шри-Ланке, то только в этом чудесном месте!! 💯 С наилучшими пожеланиями Виталий и Инна из 🇷🇺.

text: Всем добрый день! Мы долго выбирали где поселиться на острове Шри-Ланка и выбрали отель 	Calamansi Cove Villas. Забронировали на Букинге с оплатой по прибытии, все получилось отлично! Сервис супер, уборка номера ежедневная, каждый день оставляли красивые рисунки на кровати из цветов)). При отеле шикарный ресторан, где готовит шеф-повар очень вкусно. ownerResponse/text:
Dear Peter

Thanks for staying with us and such a great review. We do agree that the beach (and food!) are the stars of the show. Hard to beat. We are actually no longer a Jetwing Hotel so am pleased you managed to find us nonetheless.
Best wishes
placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
text:
This was the last stop of our recent trip to Sri Lanka and the fifth Jetwing hotel that we stayed at. We weren't disappointed.
We stayed in a lovely villa and enjoyed some really excellent food.  I can really recommend their water melon, beetroot, cucumber & feta salad and their amazing fresh fish curry.
It's a fantastic, peaceful place to unwind for a couple of days before the trip back to Colombo. Their lovely team prepared a great breakfast, in a box, for us to take with us on our trip back to the airport, given our early start. 
The pool is lovely, but the real star of the show is the magnificent white sandy beach and the great sunsets which we enjoyed before dinner.
title: A Delightful Hidden Gem

ownerResponse/text:

Come back and see us again one day...

placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
text: Simply excellent!  Excellent location, beach, food, service and pool.  My wife and I stayed after a week touring inland and we loved it.  The location was perfect - both quiet and surrounded by friendly local fishermen.  The food was so good that we did not feel any need to look elsewhere. Lots of space and comfort.  Thoroughly recommended!
title: Simply excellent!

Best regards
placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
text:
This is a small piece of heaven. You live in small villas where you have your own garden, a beautiful room and a very luxerious bathroom. The villa is kept nice and clean at all times. 
The food at the restaurant is excellent. Best food I’ve had in Sri Lanka. 
The pool area is nice and cozy and the ocean is only a few steps away. Here you will find a Beach of pure stand - really great.
The staff is absolutely great - they know what you want even before you know it. 
Go here to relax, get re-energized and enjoy this piece of heaven. I am absolutly coming back.
title: A small piece of Heaven

text: We came to this hotel because a friend of ours recommended it, saying it had a very beautiful and pleasant environment. What our friend told us turned out to be completely true. As soon as we arrived, we received a very warm welcome. Kasun and Suranga at the front desk gave us a friendly reception. Kasun took us to our room and provided excellent service. He even helped us arrange food from another hotel. The room was very clean, and the food at the restaurant was also very tasty. We had a truly wonderful and memorable experience. The service provided by Kasun and Suranga at the front desk was outstanding.

title: Excellent service

placeInfo/address: Porutota Road, Negombo 11500 Sri Lanka
text:
Being monsoon off peak season, it’s probably not busy enough for a true buffet. After being seated at our table with serviettes laid on our laps, we were presented with a menu listing all options, automatically given a fruit platter, baked goods plate and toast. We then ordered juice of choice, teas and coffee, then choice of eggs plus sides, followed by (if you had a pocket of stomach left) French toast, waffles or pancakes. 
The service was delightful, very friendly and attentive staff- Madushika, Fezal, Pradeepa, Kithgiri, Shehan.
Thanks to all who provided a welcoming first breakfast in Sri Lanka.
title: Breakfast buffet- amazing!

text: Beautiful place and exceptional staff. They want to make sure everyone is happy and cared for. Shout out to Serenath, Thusantha, Kithsiri, Wipula, Predeepa, Manoj and Niroda. The food is exceptional and will check your preferences in spice levels. The breakfast buffet was great but loved the non buffet breakfast options. We had a fruit platter, mini pastries and followed by cooked breakfast either Sri Lankan or English. But most of all shout out the chef who made us fresh Roast Pan. It was fabulous and most greatful for. There is a friendly dog that visits and will come and say hello. Whilst we were walking on the street he recognised us and came to say hello. Please ignore bad reviews, the rooms were clean and spacious. Beds were so comfy. No worry of mosquitoes and you get chipmunks around looking for food. Beach is right outside.
title: Holiday to recover from jetleg and Chill

placeInfo/address: Porutota Road, Negombo 11500 Sri Lanka
text:
We had a wonderful stay at Jetwing Beach Hotel, Negombo! From the moment we arrived, everything went smoothly. The warm welcome and friendly service made us feel right at home. We checked in quickly and were given a neat, comfortable sea-view room. The staff members were all friendly, professional, and always ready to assist with a smile.
 A special thank you to Dahan at the lobby area — he was very friendly and helpful throughout our stay. I asked him several questions about nearby locations and other things, and he answered everything kindly and patiently. Truly appreciated his support and professionalism. Thank you for the great experience.
title: Great stay at Jetwing Beach Hotel

placeInfo/address: Porutota Road, Negombo 11500 Sri Lanka
text:
I had a fantastic experience at Jetwing Beach Hotel. The service was excellent from the moment we arrived — smooth check-in, warm welcomes, and very attentive staff. The view from the hotel is stunning, especially around sunset — truly a perfect beachside escape.

One of the highlights of our stay was the staff. Everyone was kind and helpful, making sure we were comfortable throughout. A special mention goes to Chamod, who went above and beyond to make our visit even more enjoyable. His friendliness and professionalism really stood out.

Overall, it’s a beautiful place to relax and unwind, and I’d definitely recommend Jetwing Beach Hotel to anyone visiting the area!
title: Jetwing Beach Hotel – A Wonderful Stay!

text: Fantastic service, friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean, great location, great food. Nothing is too difficult. I’m going back.
title: Fantastic zstat

placeInfo/address: Porutota Road, Negombo 11500 Sri Lanka
text:
Can’t rate this place highly enough and 5 stars aren’t high enough.

Serenath and his team go out of their way to make sure you enjoy your stay.

The rooms are spacious, clean, comfortable and well appointed.

The large bath with a view out to the ocean is amazing!

The housekeeping team make sure your room is immaculate.

The reception staff very welcoming, friendly and helpful.

The waiting and kitchen staff are very efficient, friendly and make sure that your food is just right for you and are happy to deal with any special requests.

The food was exceptional and the fruit juices were worth the wait for them to be prepared from ripe fresh fruit. The Thambili and passion fruit juices are highly recommended.

The treacle tour experience is excellent and thoroughly recommended if you want a culinary experience of real local life.

Special shout out to Serenath, Thusantha, Kithsiri, Wipula, Predeepa, Manoj and Niroda.
title: Amazing beach holiday

placeInfo/address: Porutota Road, Negombo 11500 Sri Lanka
text: Beautiful hotel in a beautiful location. Staff are amazing. Special thanks to Kithsiri, Madushika, Nirodha and Pradeep’s.   Great food. Very clean hotel. Bed was amazing had a great nights sleep. Hope to come back again some day soon.  Will recommend to family and friends
title: Sri Lanka holiday

placeInfo/address: Porutota Road, Negombo 11500 Sri Lanka
text: Had a great cooking demonstration experience, the staff was very accommodating to our requests and brought us to the fish markets early in the morning to select our fish to cook. We then had a private session with a very experienced chef Unwan who taught us how to cook different dishes with the fish we bought. We had a wonderful experience. Highly recommend this to anyone who comes!!
title: Sri Lankan Cooking Demonstration

placeInfo/address: Porutota Road, Negombo 11500 Sri Lanka
text: What makes us to stay in Sand’s restaurant is Tushantha - proactively approached when we just entered and not sure which restaurant in town to choose. He understood what exactly we expected - set up, food selection - he made it happen. Excellent, personalised service - not only from Tushantha but from his entire team. Food quality - exceptional! Strongly recommend this place if you are looking for high quality food, personalised service and good vibe - ocean front.
title: Beachfront restaurant with amazing service and food

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Make sure you have a mosquito spray on you
text:
Excellent location very close to the safari activities
Fine decorated apartment with a wonderful view of the tropical savannah 
Everything was clean and tidy 
Friendly staff 
Sudesh and his brother are amazing hosts 
Swimming pool offers a great opportunity to cool yourself after a long day of safari
title: Great place to stay

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: In a tucked away location off the main route this is an ideal quiet base to stay while visiting the Udawalawa National Park.  Clean rooms with balconies and well equipped bathrooms.  An excellent pool to revive after the heat of the day.  A small restaurant where we had some good food - especially breakfast with very good coffee!
title: Nice pool and very friendly staff.

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
Lovely small hotel with 4 suites with their own balconies and a small apartment block, situated away from the main road, with the sound of peacocks, monkeys and parakeets.

There is a heated pool, dining area and Charlie, Ruby and their 3 very cute puppies!

Sudesh organised a great tour of Udawalwe National Park which is 10 mins away amd looked after us. This is a very child friendly tour with lots and lots of elephants.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone travelling through this way.
title: 5 Star in everyway

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: What a service!!! We stayed in the family apartment, so luciatåg & beatiful. The food was not super and kind of expansive but the service was just top notch! Thank you for this stay and the fresh fruit weve got with us on the trip!
title: 1 night in the jungle

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
We went white our 2 children for half day in the hotel eat lunch and dinner by the pull and use all facilities in 13 o’clock jeep driver come and pick us to the safari very good host 
It was a day to remember
title: Day trip udawalawa

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
We had an absolutely fantastic stay at Jungle paradise. We came for 2 nights with a group of 7 including our little boy. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff who organised a surprise birthday cake and a fantastic safari. 
The rooms are super comfortable and the pool is idyllic. A perfect and tranquil location a stones throw from Udawalawe. Thanks for having us.
title: Fantastic stay

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Use as a halfway point from Ella to Mirissa/the South. Definitely see the elephants. Stay at least 2 nights if you can - it’s worth it!
text: We are short on time in Sri Lanka, so with such a tight itinerary we could only stay one night here but wish it had been for two or three - that would be ideal if your trip allows it. It’s an excellent stop-off between Ella and the coast - roughly 2 hours/100km. This hotel is set in a stunning location with beautiful trees and flowers that have been well tended; we lay by the pool listening to peacocks and toucans calling. Namal and his team were delightful and went out of their way to make sure we were happy. We had a lovely welcome drink on arrival and they made us tea for 5.45 with the offer of a packed breakfast before our elephant safari. Our room was clean, spacious, and with a lovely private balcony/verandah, which would have been lovely to have spent more time on if it allowed. The swimming pool was an added bonus which we used several times during our short stay - Namal very kindly allowed us to use it in the evening after dinner as we’d arrived late from Ella. From here, you are a 10 minute drive to the National Park, which is a must. You are even closer to the elephant transite site (orphanage), which we didn’t go to but wish we had in hindsight. It has a decent reputation of being ethical and you can bottle fed babies at 10.30 and 2.30 (we were heading to the coast at midday so couldn’t do the later, and had thought the first slot would be too tight - but actually the elephant safari was 6.30-9.30 and is just a little down the road). As with all of Sri Lanka, everything about Jungle Paradise and this area is delightful and the team will be only to glad to see you visit here.
title: Jungle Paradise - exactly what it says on the tin

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
This is a really nice place to have a peaceful holiday, away from the maddening crowds.  Very well planned accomodation with all the necessary ammenities and most helpful and friendly staff.  

Great place to unwind, relax and be at peace.
title: A Jungle Paradise indeed

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: Great Place to be! Very nice staff and good food! The coffee is amazing! We stayed at a bungalow. Clean, Good furnished and sized. We loved the atmosphere and to swim at the pool! It is close to the national park to go to a safari trip! See you next time!
title: Nice place to be!

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
Great value for money. 2 nights recommended, Attentative staff! Safari / feeding elephants easy to reach. Mr. Namal was great! I do thank the owner for creating such a place! 

Two bedroom suite with balcony new. 

Inet - bad (but due to the power cuts). You buy for 5 USD your own local SIM card...

PS: the last 200 m leading to the hotel could be renovated....?
title: Max. satisfaction!

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
It was a awesome experience ....superb service and facilties....highly recommend for nature lovers..
Its easiliy accessible ....locates in the banks of udawalawa resvoir spill way...

Wow  what a experience ....
All the best
title: Jungle paradise

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: We stayed 1 night at Jungle Paradise and enjoyed a safari arranged by the hotel. The hotel itself exceeded our expectations, our room was spacious, very clean, and we had regular hot water. The balcony area was great. The pool is also very pleasant and clean. They arranged an afternoon safari for us which was very enjoyable, the driver spoke good english, was knowledgable and had eyes like a hawk spotting animals that we could have missed. On the drive back to the hotel we passed some sugar canes and the safari driver, of his own accord, hacked a small one down for us. The hotel chopped this into edible pieces and showed us how to eat natural sugar cane for dessert, which was was unique and delicious. We ordered the sri lankan curry for dinner, which was a very tasty meal, and the fruit and omlette for breakfast was simple but tasted ok. The communal eating area is less bug-free than the rooms, but this is because it is partly outside, and generally we are talking mainly flies, beetles, gheckos (and some sweet cats). Nothing truly scary. Service at this hotel was wonderful, they were very friendly, polite, and spoke good english. One thing I would note for light sleepers is that the sounds of the surrounding jungle are loud in the night, so bring earplugs!
title: Exceeded expectations

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: My friend and I stayed at jungle paradise as part of our tour of the national park! Our room was amazing, it was clean and spacious! The aircon worked well! We had a big balcony that over looked the jungle which we enjoyed greatly! The pool was great and the grounds are well kept! We believe this is the best accomodation in Sri Lanka! The staff are wonderful and we would recommend to all, they couldn’t do enough for us!
title: Best accommodation in Sri Lanka!

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
We stayed here for 2 nights in December. The villas/ accommodation were beautiful. The rooms were big, spacious and very clean. Good big bathroom too with hot shower. The staff (3 brothers) and Gernot the owner are all very very friendly and extremely helpful. Safari was organized for us and it was great. The pool is fabulous. Food was amazing- local Sri Lankan from a local cook. Delicious! Staff are there 24 hours should you need anything. Private, secure parking for our tuk-tuk. 
Highly recommend this place to stay as it is so close to Udawalawe national park and a great place to rest and recharge for your next stop!
title: Amazing find

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
The place is well constructed, clean, and very well maintained. There is reliable WiFi everywhere. A beautiful pool to use as well. We booked the large suite which had an impeccable balcony view. The air conditioning and fans made it more than comfortable.  The sitting area was great for lounging in the cool inside or getting some work done. The hotel is located ~10 min drive from the entrance to the national park.

The best part far and away is the fantastic staff. Sudesh, specifically, took amazing care of us from the moment we arrived. He was disappointed we didn’t inform him it was our honeymoon so he could have made special arrangements! They are amazingly friendly and easy to talk to. They served us Lion beers in the pool, breakfast to the room, and made a delicious kottu our first night with rice and curry (the best meal we’d had in Sri Lanka yet) on the second night. 

Sudesh was helpful in arranging a car for us to get to our next destination as well, and made a number of personal recommendations we’re looking forward to trying out.
title: Tremendous Property with Excellent Service

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: We had the a lovely stay at jungle paradise with Sudesh giving an excellent service to us . It’s a clean private place and we stayed in one of the chalets which was very spacious , including the bathrooms . Its a few mins drive to  the Udawalawe park . The garden and the pool was maintained well . Can improve on the food a bit more but overall we were very satisfied of the place for the price we stayed. Will definitely go back if we are to stay again in Udawalawe!
title: Clean lovely place with excellent service

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: It was a great experience staying at JungleParadis. First of all is was super clean, so it was very relaxing for us as parents to let our baby crawl around and explore the area on ground. Very spacious rooms. Second of all the staff was really friendly, helpful and welcoming so we had the best stay. It is a beautiful place with an amazing jungle nature around. The pool was also amazing and very clean. All around a great couple of days in a red beautiful place.
title: True paradise

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text: The place was well cleaned and well maintained. The pool was awesome. All of the staff were extremely friendly and accommodating, they made us feel comfortable and it made us to extend our stay up to 3days. Highly recommended for families and couples who looking for privacy , silent and safe wildlife experience.
title: Fabulous accommodation....

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Call the property
text: Superb place. Perfect distance to Udawalawa Wildlife park gate. Though it’s in a miles distance this gives you the feeling of living in much closer to the nature with out hustle of the busy surroundings of the park entrance. The chalet are spotlessly clean and almost feel like home. What did really caught our attraction was huge veranda balcony which faced the spill water area of the lake. The breakfast they served was superb. Though we came very late after a morning safari they were still waiting. The staff here gets the best ratings as they did made our lives very comfortable. From checking in to booking a safari jeep they helped a lot. Recommend to anyone who really wants to visit Udawalawa and tranquillity of nature.
title: Clam and quiet paradise

placeInfo/address: 2066 1/2 Ekamuthugama, Usweliara, Udawalawa 70190 Sri Lanka
text:
We spent two days at Jungle Paradise. The staff are very accommodating and genuine nice people. Rooms are clean, AC is good, and there is also a nice pool. It is literally in the jungle so the tranquility is bliss. Wake up and listen to the birdsongs before heading out on safari. Sudesh and the crew will make freshly picked fruit juice straight from the backyard. 

Definitely recommend this place.
title: Amazing place surrounded by fruit trees

placeInfo/address: 831 1/3, Pelwehera Road, Dambulla 21100 Sri Lanka
text: Stayed two nights, great location middle of a village in Dambulla, easy access to Sigiriya and Habrana, Food was great, friendly staff. Good hotel if you are looking for getaway hotel, Pool was excellent
title: Great location

placeInfo/address: 831 1/3, Pelwehera Road, Dambulla 21100 Sri Lanka
text:
Stayed superb safe stay during the pandemic. From the reservation till the check out we have been treated very professionally.Great food and accommodation. Special thanks to Mr.Ranjith/Gayan/Hasitha and all crew for exceptional service.
We hope to come back soon......
title: Perfect

placeInfo/address: 831 1/3, Pelwehera Road, Dambulla 21100 Sri Lanka
text:
This place doesn't deserve the 1 star rating on Google. This place is a beautiful boutique hotel, easily worth 4* with 5* service. Anoj is really a nice guy, always brimming with smiles.

The breakfast was HUGE with bread, hoppers, dhall, fish, sambol, fruits, pancakes, fruit juice and tea/coffee.

The rooms are great with good bathrooms and great views. They also have a great swimming pool and we enjoyed it after a hectic day climbing pidurangala. The pool is warm even at 8pm.

Wake up early and go see the birds on the lake. I was there around 6am and there were plenty of birds to see from the tree hut. It was magic photographing them. I even spotted an alligator. 

All in all great stay. The staff are very friendly too. Especially the lady at the reception. Would stay here again without an inch of doubt.

Improvement : Please add a lock to the bathroom door in the restaurant. Also improve the Wifi as it was patchy in the rooms
title: 5 STAR

placeInfo/address: 831 1/3, Pelwehera Road, Dambulla 21100 Sri Lanka
roomTip: We shared room X suite with our family which had two balconies.
text: My wife and I and two of our teenage boys stayed here for two nights.  The stay and overall experience were lovely:  beautiful grounds, pool, comfortable, well-designed rooms and a lake at the end of the property which made me feel like I was in a "Mutual of Omaha Wild-Kingdom" film clip.  But more than that, the staff are outstanding.  Between welcome drinks, help with extras on wifi and laundry, an evening nature walk, amazing chef-prepared meals, and access to key sites nearby, we highly recommend this place.
title: Secluded resort enclave with easy access Sigiriya and Dambulla

placeInfo/address: 831 1/3, Pelwehera Road, Dambulla 21100 Sri Lanka
text: Stayed here for a couple of nights. Lovely secluded location with a lake at the end of the garden. Greeted with a lovely welcome drink. Good sized and comfortable room. Great breakfast and evening meals (we ate there both nights). You'll need some form of transport to eat anywhere else. Very friendly staff.
title: Lovely place

The breakfast is very delicious and every morning they are serving a different kind of Sri Lankan style breakfast as a side dish. Perfect to explore the Sri Lankan cuisine.
The pool is the right place to relax after an exhausting day.
Very friendly staff and very good service !!!!
I would stay there next time again....

From the base of this wonderful hotel I saw and experienced many unique things that I never expected to see from a home cooking demo strand lunch in a local home to elephants and monkeys. You will not be disappointed if you choose Athena Lake to stay in 😀

text: Отель небольшой, но уютный. Расположен, можно сказать на "нулевой" линии, самый огромный плюс этого отеля! Лучший вид из номера с видом на океан! Еще плюс: свои лежаки и бассейн, уместили превосходно. Отельный ресторан без изысков, меню не менялось, но это проблема из- за малого числа номеров и соответственно постояльцев таких отелей. Персонал очень вежливый, но общение на английском, хотя особо не напрягало.  Свой пляж перед отелем для только попрыгать в волнах, если спокойно поплавать, то налево метров 100 по песку к Черепашьему пляжу, там почти штиль в самом углу лагуны... Отдохнули великолепно, посмотрели вживую райские места!

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Номера с видом на океан - просто бомба!
text:
Если когда-нибудь я вернусь в Хиккадуву, то только в этот отель! Уютный маленький оазис на самом берегу океана. Очень дружелюбный и отзывчивый персонал! Готовы решить любую проблему, любой вопрос. 
Отель удобно расположен - рядом магазинчики, банки, кафе. Мы брали только завтраки. Кухня адаптирована под европейского туриста: делают омлет или глазунью на ваш выбор. Специи, добавки - по желанию. Очень вкусный хлеб. Выпечка тоже - пончики, круассаны и прочее. Из фруктов - ананас, бананы, папайя. Утром натуральные соки двух видов. Очень понравился манговый.
Рынки (рыбный и фрукты-овощи в 10 мин. ходьбы). Мы были только один раз - купили манго, съели с удовольствием.
Вечером, лёжа в бассейне, можно смотреть заход солнца. Полный релакс.
У отеля своеобразная пляжная линия, её нет. Есть ступеньки, дальше по двум плитам - и ты в океане. В отлив купаться напротив отеля - одно удовольствие! 
Рядом черепаший пляж, и в другой стороне пляж с рыбками. Риф там совсем рядом с берегом. Мы наснимали много интересных кадров. Отель однозначно всем рекомендую!
И да, в дни рождения очень круто поздравляют всех постояльцев!
title: Южная Азия перевернула мой мир! Шри-Ланка поразила свое зеленью, гостеприимством, тёплым океаном.

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text: Отдыхали  в отели с 08.02.2025 по 17.02.2025  с мужем .  Отель очень понравился . Уютный небольшой  очень чистый отель  с бассейном и со своим выходом пляжем на море. А так же рядом находится пляж с дайвингом и черепаший пляж. Все в шаговой доступности кафе, торговые магазинчики. Персонал отеля доброжелательный отзывчивый .  В апартаментах уборка ежедневная, смена полотенец.  Прекрасный холл   С видом на океан.  Лежаки, полотенце, душ, раздевалки - все предусмотрено для отличного отдыха! Очень признательны своего турагентство, что порекомендовали нам этот отель. Кухня шикарная - брали завтрак и ужин.  Завтрак  - шведский стол. Изобилие блюд. Все очень вкусно. В первые 5-ты дней ужин  - ввиде выбора меню из  3-х основных блюд  на выбор говядина , рыба, курица. И из основных  суп, салат, 2-е на выбор, десерт, фрукты. И все это на ужин. Очень красиво сервирован, подают официанты. Последние 3 дня шведский стол - изобилие блюд, десертов, салатов. Вообще в шоке от изобилия блюд , обслуживания! Благодарю ! Благодарю! За предоставленный кусочек рая за эти дни!  В своём сердце увезу красоту природы, душевности  людей  Шри Ланки.  С удовольствием еще раз посетила бы этот удивительный мир под названием Шри Ланка. ❤️

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
Отдыхали в Coral Rock by Bansei с 3 по 12 февраля 2025г. Отличный отель с прекрасным и отзывчивым персоналом , все очень добрые и приветливые. Когда мы приехали нас встречали , предложили напитки с дороги ( мелочь , а приятно ) . Поздравили всем персоналом с днем рождения на завтраке , подарив тортик . Очень мило . 
У отеля нет своего пляжа с песком , но можно лежать у бассейна где есть лежаки и спуск в океан , каменистый но приемлемый. Завтраки в отеле хорошие, шведский стол , каждый день свежие фрукты и соки . В номере есть кондиционер , в целом нормера нормальные , у нас был с видом на океан , это прям потрясающий вид и шум от океана не мешал , а даже помогал хорошенько выспаться. Убирались каждый день , меняли полотенца , вода и чай всегда были. В общем советую этот отель , относительно цены и качества все пять звезд . 👍

text:
Отличный отель в своей цене. Номера делюкс лучшие. Выбирайте их и будет вам услада для глаз и ушей. Океана много не бывает. Питание в отеле очень хорошее. Персонал приветливый. Директор отеля и Уреша очень приятные люди. Привет от мамы (агента) с тремя детьми 🫰
Единственный минус это уборка в номерах (даже при почти ежедневных чаевых). Подметают пол и заправляют кровать, а как же пыль на столах и шкафах и насекомые в ванной тоже бы как то обрабатывать. 
В номере 2 больших стола, занимают место, думаю один из них лишний, лучше шкаф для вещей поставить или добавить 1 кровать при необходимости разместить семью 2+2. А Мы к вам обязательно вернемся 👍

Dear Sir/Madam,

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
Были с 26.12 по 05.01. Приехали в отель около 13:00, попросили подождать. Мы оставили чемоданы и сходили на обед, благо ресторанов вокруг много.
Заселили нас с детьми в два номера рядом, дверь в дверь, очень было удобно, кровать большую у детей в комнате раздвинули на две сразу после запроса.
Уборка проходила каждый день, убирали чисто, а если шоколадку или чаевые оставите, то еще и полотенца закрутят. Вообще персонал очень отзывчивый, и на рецепшене, и те кто убирали, и в ресторане, всегда улыбчивые, здороваются, желают доброго дня. Мы с мужем в последние дни заболели, нам из ресторана еду приносили в номер. Если непонятно, то общались через переводчик в телефоне. А какие боксы с завтраком собирают, если на экскурсию рано выезжать, там столько всего, что еще и на обед останется перекусить.
Завтраки понравились, выпечка вкусная, лапша, карри, яйца жарят глазунью и омлет, фрукты несколько видов, и мы с мужем, и дети всегда наедались. Кофе не очень понравился, пили чай вместо него.
Номер был с видом на море, шумно, но очень красиво! У детей был номер стандарт (на дорогу), он чуть побольше нашего делюкса, шум с дороги детей не беспокоил.
Новогодний ужин был включен в тур, понравился, очень вкусно было и очень разнообразно! Повара - молодцы!
Хотели при заезде взять еще ужины, но сразу забыли, а потом уже не стали. Хотя пери��дически обедали в ресторане  нашего отеля, всегда было очень вкусно и даже дешевле, чем в ресторанах в округе.
Расположение понравилось, много магазинчиков и кафе рядом, можно купаться прям перед отелем, волны не сильные, налево - пляж с черепахами, прям за ним дальше с берега можно походить по камням (только в коралках, там ежей много), там среди камней мурены, крылатки, акулу рифовую видели и другие рыбки; налево если по пляжу пойти от отеля, то там тоже есть риф с рыбками, можно с маской поплавать и посмотреть, там же и искупаться можно, вода поспокойнее.
Очень понравилось в отеле, чистенько, по домашнему, персонал очень хороший! 
Спасибо вам! С удовольствием вернемся в этот отель!
title: Семьей в декабре-январе

placeInfo/address: Mahagastota Hill Climb Blackpool, Nuwara Eliya 22200 Sri Lanka
text:
Had a very comfortable and pleasant stay here. Very thoughtfully and tastefully designed rooms (it's also a fairly new hotel).

Staff were generally friendly and helpful enough, food was slightly above average quality but generous.

Location is a bit out of the way since it's 15-20 mins drive to nuwaraeliya, but if you've got a car and driver and want a quieter location it's fine.

Perhaps management could ask the staff to be quieter in the hallways at night time.

I'd definitely return just because I found it value for money and comfortable and not pretentious (as a few places are in Nuwaraeliya)..

Tip: ask for a room with a decent view to ghe front or side, mine overlooked a cabbage patch!
title: Pleasant stay in a good room!

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your beautifully written review and for choosing to stay with us at Jetwing Lighthouse. We’re truly delighted to hear that your experience was both memorable and meaningful.

It’s wonderful to know that you appreciated the architectural elegance of the hotel, the sustainability efforts we’re so proud of, and the little touches like the king coconut welcome. Your description of the sea view room and the full moon atmosphere was absolutely poetic; we’re so pleased it offered you the sense of serenity you were seeking.

We’re also glad to hear that our unique dual-pool setup made a lasting impression, especially the lap pool by the waves. It’s rare feedback like this that reminds us how special the natural surroundings here truly are.

Thank you again for your kind words about our team, the dining experiences, and the overall ambiance. We look forward to welcoming you back for an even longer and more relaxing stay in the near future.

Ayubowan! (May you live long)

Indika Gamage
Head of Galle Hotels
Jetwing Lighthouse
placeInfo/address: 433 A Dadella, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
This hotel stands out for its architectural elegance and thoughtful design. The welcome with king coconut water was a refreshing touch after arrival. The rooms are spacious, well-furnished, and equipped with excellent amenities. Its commitment to sustainability is impressive—arguably one of the best I've seen.

I stayed in a sea view room, which was fantastic. It was just after the full moon—clouds moved across the sky, occasionally letting moonlight shine through. The atmosphere was serene, and I deeply enjoyed the solitude.

There are two swimming pools: one ideal for families, and another 25-meter lap pool that I especially appreciated—something I’ve rarely seen in hotels. Swimming there while listening to the crashing waves and watching them break into white foam was a unique experience.

The staff were warm and professional. Dinner and breakfast were both sumptuous and very well arranged, offering a wide variety.

Overall, this was a memorable stay—one of the best in recent years. I definitely plan to return for a longer visit.
title: Exceptional Stay – A Solitary Moonlit Sojourn by the Sea

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you so much for your generous and detailed review. We're truly delighted to hear that your family had such a special stay at Jetwing Lighthouse.

It’s wonderful to know that so many members of our helped make your experience memorable. We're especially glad your children enjoyed the creative activities, and that you were able to relax and take in so many unique experiences from the pool and spa to the visit to Jetwing Kurulubedda and the Galle Fort tour.

Your kind words about the warmth of our hospitality, attention to detail, and upkeep of the property mean a great deal to us. Feedback like yours inspires us to keep delivering the highest level of service to every guest.

Thank you again for choosing Jetwing Lighthouse. We truly look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another unforgettable stay.

Ayubowan! (May you live long)

Indika Gamage
Head of Galle Hotels
Jetwing Lighthouse
placeInfo/address: 433 A Dadella, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
Our family’s stay at Jetwing Lighthouse was nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment we arrived, we were met with genuine warmth, attention to detail, and an atmosphere that perfectly blends luxury with the heart of Sri Lankan hospitality.

We were graciously welcomed by Umesha, whose kind and professional demeanor set the tone for the rest of our stay. She also hosted our afternoon tea, a serene experience overlooking the ocean with a lovely selection of teas, pastries, and savory treats. Her thoughtful care made the moment feel truly special.

Dining was consistently excellent across all three restaurants. Under the steady leadership of Awilse, every meal was served with precision, warmth, and attention to detail. The food was incredible—beautifully presented and rich in flavor.

Our children had an amazing time thanks to Imasha and Arushana, who organized creative activities like seashell jewelry making, stick figurines from coconut palm leaves, and a fun ice cream treat. They made our kids feel welcome, valued, and entertained throughout the stay.

The pool experience was another highlight, especially with Buddhika ensuring everything was clean, safe, and comfortable. The fact that the pool is filled with fresh, pure water from on-site wells was impressive—it made swimming feel even more refreshing. At the pool bar, Nimesh and Danidu stood out with their friendly and attentive service. Always serving with a smile, they made sure our family had everything we needed while relaxing poolside.

My wife also enjoyed a phenomenal spa treatment, which she described as peaceful and deeply rejuvenating.

Each night, we returned to a perfectly prepared room thanks to the daily turndown service—a small but impactful luxury that added to the overall comfort of our stay.

One of the standout experiences was the complimentary tuk tuk tour to Jetwing Kurulubedda, their sister property nestled in the jungle. The serene surroundings and breathtaking views of the six villas made for an unforgettable afternoon. We were served a unique and refreshing mangrove apple drink, crafted onsite and unlike anything we’ve tasted before.

Thanks to Imasha’s recommendation, we also enjoyed a guided tour of Galle Fort—organized entirely by the hotel. From the transport to the knowledgeable guide, it was the perfect way to experience the fort’s rich history without any hassle.

Adding a cultural touch to our stay was the traditional Kandyan dance performance hosted one evening at the hotel. It was a vibrant and captivating experience that brought Sri Lankan tradition to life right on the property.

One final note that truly impressed us was how well-maintained the resort is. We regularly observed quiet upkeep and repairs happening throughout the property—especially important for a beachfront hotel. It showed us how much care and pride the team takes in preserving the beauty and quality of Jetwing Lighthouse.

This resort is more than a destination—it’s a complete experience. Every team member, from the front desk to the bar staff, went out of their way to make our family feel at home. We left with full hearts, cherished memories, and an eagerness to return.

If you’re visiting Galle, do not miss the opportunity to stay at Jetwing Lighthouse. It is, without a doubt, a gem of Sri Lanka.
title: Jetwing Lighthouse – A Thoughtfully Curated, Unforgettable Stay for the Whole Family

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your stay with us at Jetwing Lighthouse. We’re thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time in the John Davy Suite and that it was the best suite you’ve experienced in Sri Lanka; that truly means a lot to us.

We're especially pleased to hear your kind words about Jayan’s excellent service and the warm hospitality from the rest of our team. Your recognition will certainly be shared with them.

We appreciate your honest comments regarding the food and valet parking. We’re sorry to hear that the dining experience didn’t meet your expectations this time. Please rest assured that your feedback has been shared with our culinary and management teams for review and improvement. Regarding parking, we understand how important convenience is upon arrival, and we will certainly look into ways we can enhance this aspect of the guest experience.

placeInfo/address: 433 A Dadella, Galle 80000 Sri Lanka
text:
We had a truly unforgettable stay at Jetwing Lighthouse in Galle. From the moment we arrived, we were impressed by the stunning architecture and the breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean. Designed by the legendary Geoffrey Bawa, the hotel's aesthetic blends modern luxury with Sri Lankan heritage, creating a peaceful and elegant atmosphere.
The staff was incredibly warm and attentive, Jayan , Nimasha, Dhananjani and the rest of the staff were always ready with a smile and happy to assist with any request. The dining options were excellent, offering a mix of local flavors and international cuisine, and the seafood was especially fresh and flavorful.
Jetwing Lighthouse is a perfect blend of comfort, culture, and coastal beauty. I highly recommend it for couples, families, or anyone looking to unwind in style in southern Sri Lanka.
title: Unforgettable Stay at Jetwing Lighthouse

text:
That was really unexpected to arrive to this Hotel because our agency failed us the day before arrival. And we were really happy for this lucky change!
This is a very quiet and peacefull place with almost your own beach because only fishermen in the evening present there! It’s like a small lagoon for a lovely couple or a family with kids.
At first you think that staff is a bit slow on kitchen, but later you get used to it and start enjoying the calm and soft way of life there.
Pool is very nice, rooms are clean and got own space in the jungle. Lot’s of different animals can be met there: from monkeys to varans.
Special thanks to Neru at reception, she really helped us a lot with everything! And additional words to Aseila, the massage master - it was great!
title: Wonderful place!

text: I was looking for a place which is far from busy towns with a nice empty sand beach. Calamansi Cove villas in Balapitiya had it all, I was met by the admin lady Nirodha who helped me to arrange all my needs including everyday massage and yoga practice and the beach guard Sujith made my long swimming safe (the sea is very calm there at mornings and becomes a little bit wavy at evenings but it allows to swim 5-7 kilometers a day easily - Sujith was always checking on me). So I highly recommend this hotel and its staff even for lone ladies who need a protection while they are enjoying life at its best!
title: Marvelous holiday! Quiet, beautiful and safe place; the safety I needed most of all because I went to Sri Lanka alone

ownerResponse/text:
Thankyou so much for your wonderful review. We are all so grateful for your praise and so pleased you loved the place so much.  I have already heard back from the staff teams and they were delighted to hear your feedback (including Sujit the Lifeguard!).  We do hope you make that return journey and look forward to welcoming you back then.  
Best Regards.
placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
roomTip: There are good walks on long beaches in both directions. I also enjoyed the short walk into the small town.
text:
I loved everything about this place. I was daydreaming about ways to return for a longer stay even before I had completed my first four days.  And I'm still determined to return.   Like so many of the reviews say - it is located on a perfect swimming beach that often feels private.  But some reviews don't mention how the beach also hosts its own culture of night fishermen and their boats and sometimes day fishing families with their huge nets.  Calamansi Cove is a beautifully  gardened property with paths that yield delightful surprises with each turn.   I loved the serenity of my indoor/outdoor villa, with its roof terrace and white Frangipani tree, its outdoor seating and fan, the gorgeous skylit shower.  I was visited by many birds, frogs, and even a friendly mongoose one morning.  The food is outstanding.  I highly recommend having the very fresh and very local "Jack Fish," at least once while you're here!  If you're lucky, you might have Chandana's expert attentions to guide you through the possibilities.

I think the magic of the place is made by the people there.  Many of them are named in other reviews.  The first and maybe last person you'll encounter is Nirodha, who was a huge help to me, and so warmly welcoming, easy to talk to.  The lifeguard, whose name I've misplaced (I'm sorry brother!), was daily good company and helpful in telling me how the weather and water would be each day.  The gardeners and the handymen were always friendly and seemed to have many interesting projects each day.  The gatekeepers pay attention and the housekeepers and the restaurant staff clearly care for detail. The masseur and the yoga instructor are both frank and supportive.   All are as warm and skilled as I've encountered anywhere in my many years of travelling.  It's not just creative professionlism - they have together a family sensibility, and after having good conversation with the completely charming owners, I can see why.  There's something very special and very sincere about this place.   It has all the balances right.
title: Sincerity, Beauty, Magic

ownerResponse/text:
Дорогой N8233JI_

Ух ты! Какой обзор!

Благодарим вас за ваши добрые комментарии и время, которое вы потратили на отзыв о нас.

Мы очень довольны вашим отзывом и передали ваши комментарии персоналу и шеф-повару. Это именно то, что мы ищем в наших гостях, и мы очень рады, что смогли превзойти ваши ожидания.

Мы надеемся, что вы скоро сможете вернуться и увидеть нас снова.

С наилучшими пожеланиями
placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
text:
Отдыхали в Calamansi Cove Villas с 20.01.24 по 02.02.2024
Начну с того, что решили лететь на Шри-Ланку внезапно, у меня оказалось 2 недели свободного времени, поэтому быстро собрали чемоданы с супругой и на следующий день уже вылетели. Так как практически все отели были забиты под завязку и бронь нигде не подтверждали, выбирали из мгновенного подтверждения. Из 6 отелей выбрали Calamansi и не прогадали, хотя отзывы были неоднозначные, но в целом большинство отзывов хорошие и по фото нам зашел отель. Мы изначально хотели именно бутиковый небольшой отель, так как в таких отелях бывали не один раз и все было отлично! 
Летели Air Arabia со стыковкой в 50 минут в Шардже. Перелет хороший, обслуживание на самолетах приемлемое, только питание платное. Либо запасайтесь едой заранее, либо можно заказать при регистрации на рейс из меню. Можно и в самолете купить по меню за $. В общем прилетели мы в 4-30 утра, быстро прошли паспортный контроль и в 5-30 уже ехали в отель (трансфер заказывали индивидуальный 200$ в Москве) Добрались в 7 утра до отеля и просто обалдели от фантастических видов!!!
Нам сказали подождать с заселением пару часов и предложили позавтракать и посмотреть бухту рядом с отелем. Завтрак был бомбический, в течении часа подача еды, сначала кофе или чай, потом фруктовая тарелка, следом йогрут с фруктами, далее сыр и булочки, после, омлет с беконом, куриной котлетой, зеленью и овощами!  И после десерт из блинчиков с бананами и шоколадным соусом. В общем мы еле вылезли из-за стола!!! И так было каждый день с возможным дополнением в меню, о котором у тебя официант спрашивает на кануне вечером. Огромный респект официанту Шандоме, он весь наш отпуск следил, чтобы мы не были голодными и любые заказы, и наши пожелания в еде исполнялись быстро и точно!!! Обеды и ужины в отеле также по меню, но уже за отдельную плату, так как у нас были только завтраки. Все очень вкусно!!! Заказывали сендвичи, креветки, ланкийскую кухню (она все равно острая, даже если им и говоришь, что не надо перчить)) всевозможные супы и т.д. Цены в ресторане конечно завышенные раза в 2. 
Во второй половине отпуска ездили в ресторан Bord'eau в 1.5 км. Там есть все что хочешь из морепродуктов - омары, креветки всевозможная рыба и т.д. Средний чек на двоих , средний омар в чесночном соусе , рис и салаты вытягивал на 60-80 $ Если заказать просто тигровых креветок с рисом и салатом выходило 30$ на двоих. Паста карбонара отличная и стоит всего 700 ланкийских рупий, на наши деньги 250 руб.  
Но главное - сам отель! 
Он находиться прямо в джунглях на первой пляжной линии. Достаточно далеко от основной дороги по побережью. Нам досталась вилла Mango! С потрясающим видом из номера через панорамное стекло от пола до потолка на джунгли! Все время джунгли жили прямо перед нами, бурундуки, обезьяны, вараны, ящерки и попугаи пробегали и пролетали мимо! Это было просто супер!!! Номер просторный, все необходимое имеется! Санузел чистый и тоже все необходимое (шампуни и гели) имеется. Уборка каждый день или по желанию. Спрашивают все время, нужен клининг и в какое время. Уборка на 5+. Молодые ланкийцы стараются вовсю, чтобы вам понравилось. Помимо основного номера у нас был сад, площадью 30-40 м.кв. с диванами и столиком для вечерних посиделок. 
Все время менеджер отеля (не помню имя, мы звали его просто Босс))) интересуется, все ли хорошо. Еще помогала хорошо девушка Нирода, она немного знает русский и мы могли с ней обсудить все вопросы в оперативном режиме!! В общем персоналу отеля 5+++ Все обаятельны и быстро решают любые проблемы.
Немного подпили крови москиты в первую ночь (потом поставили фумигатор), так что берите с собой всякие средства от насекомых.
Пляж и океан! 
Вид на бухту сно��сшибательный, слева рыбацкие лодки доходят до скал, справа песчаная коса около 1,5-2 км. Практически безлюдно, встречали пару, тройку людей за все время. В первый же день на рыбу, которые рыбаки оставили возле лодок сбежались 2х метровые вараны. Это было то еще зрелище!!! Волны в океан были, но небольшие, купаться одно удовольствие! Мы в бассейне за все время пару раз окунулись, все время в океане провели. Вода градусов 28, очень комфортно!! Два раза были волны и наш бич бой Судит вывешивал красный флаг, но мы все равно купались и Судит постоянно следил, чтобы с нами ничего не случилось! Ему отдельный привет!!! Очень хороший и интересный парень.
Бассейн отличный, рядом есть санузел и душ, смыть морскую воду. Весь отель в пальмах, так что есть где укрыться. Судит уже с утра раскладывал полотенца на те места, которые нам понравились- это сервис. 
Про экскурсии немного, брали сафари по реке 15$ с человека (очень красиво!!) и была поездка в Галле и в Хиккадуву к морским черепахам. В основном балдели в отеле и я хочу сказать, что отель превзошел все мои ожидания по сервису, видам и еде. Сюда надо ехать именно для уединения с океаном и природой! Движух и тусовок вы здесь не найдете, но вот ланкийский колорит, храмы и природа - это самый лучший релакс!!!
Если приедем на Шри-ланку, то только сюда. Это райское место!!! Спасибо всему персоналу отеля за классный отдых!!!
title: Райское место!!! Один из лучших отелей в Балапитии!!!

text:
Very happy and relieved to have stayed here after some big disappointments with some of the hotels in Sri Lanka. Great staff, food, service and all round hospitality which is not always the case in some hotels.
Best of all was how this hotel is laid out which means that all guests get their own privacy. The hotel was only half full when we visited but we felt like we had the place to ourselves. The villas are nice and spacious for two with their own patio / gardens. Nice gardens and walkways then lead you to the front restaurant / beach / pool area. Beach is wonderful - the kids could swim and there are no waves / rocks / undercurrents that you find in so many places along the coast.
Kids happy. Burgers, pasta and big bacon and egg breakfasts made their days while we kept to the Sri Lankan fish and curries - delicious.
title: Huge Happy Relief...

placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
roomTip:
Everything works! It's so easy. 

It's down a little jungle road but heavenly once inside the gate.
text:
After an adventurous tour of Sri Lanka, we found this hotel through their Instagram account. We were looking for a private stay on the beach where we could spend some quiet time with the family.
    We stayed in various hotels around the island with equally various experiences. Here at Calamansi Cove, one enters a secluded little paradise, completely apart from the sometimes mad world of Sri Lanka. Separate, single storey villas are tucked into a beautifully groomed garden offering a sense of natural privacy. 
    We took two of their beach facing villas with a fresh water swimming pool directly at hand. The clean, white washed villas each had a small garden in the front that meant we could eat or meet with the family in privacy apart from the beach.
  The staff are exceptionally well mannered, polite, personable and happy to help. We felt very comfortable letting the children play unsupervised. Sujit, their Lifeguard, kept a constant eye on everything at the pool and beach which was very reassuring.
    The food was wonderful. Ample portions - with Western dishes and all the Sri Lankan dishes we could want, all served with characteristic charm.
     Even the afternoon rain showers were handled elegantly! It usually cleared quickly leading to some wonderful beach sunsets.
     I cannot imagine a better value. There were amenities offered that we didn't even need. It was a wonderful end to our holiday. I recommend everyone experience this gem of hospitality.
title: High quality, high value, natural comfort.

placeInfo/address: Wijerama Road Brahakmana Watte, Balapitiya 80550 Sri Lanka
text: Our stay at this property was for just one night over the weekend, but wish it was longer...the hotel offered an early check-in which was very convenient since we travelled with our 13 month toddler. We opted for a garden villa and was provided one that was closest to the restaurant, pool and beach. The life guard on duty was very attentive and helped us, especially while at the beach since we wanted to give our toddler a first-hand experience of the sea  & sand. The meals were exceptional! ~ a special mention to the chef on duty ~ our small requests to the change in the menu were accommodated and they even arranged some meals for our toddler. The waiters at the restaurant were also very attentive, brisk and hospitable. A special mention to Ms. Shalini Gamage & Mr. Sampath ~ two of the most friendly individuals at the property. On the day we were to leave, we were offered a late check-out which we were thrilled to receive, as we wished our stay could be extended. However, unfortunately our vehicle broke down as we were about to depart. But luckily since we were still within the property, all staff (Mr. Sampath, Mr. Jayaweera, the security, etc.) went out of their way to assist us in sorting the issue and arranging for our transportation back home. We sincerely recommend this hotel to anyone who would like indulge in the warm hospitality that Sri Lanka has to offer, as we eagerly await to return here for a longer stay...
title: Received the Warmest Hospitality ...

We had a wonderful time at Jetwing Beach! The location is unbeatable—right on a beautiful stretch of beach, with stunning sunsets and a relaxed vibe. The room was spacious, clean, and very comfortable. Service was top-notch too—friendly, professional staff who made us feel truly welcome.

The only downside was some ongoing construction nearby, which did cause a bit of noise during the day. It wasn’t a deal-breaker, but it did take away slightly from the peaceful atmosphere.

Overall, it’s a fantastic hotel and we’d definitely come back—hopefully once the construction is done. Still highly recommend for a relaxing beach escape!

placeInfo/address: 868 Galle Rd Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
roomTip:
Unser Flug ging bereits vor der Frühstückszeit. Tipp für Reisende:
Sprecht mit dem Personal, wir haben ein leckeres Lunchpaket erhalten. :)
text:
Wir hatten das Vergnügen, ein paar Tage in diesem wunderschönen Hotel zu verbringen, und es war einfach fantastisch! Die Anlage ist äußerst gepflegt, die Zimmer waren makellos sauber, und der Ausblick auf das Meer war atemberaubend. Der ruhige und saubere Strand direkt vor dem Hotel lädt dazu ein, den gesamten Tag in absoluter Entspannung zu verbringen.

Ein weiterer Pluspunkt: Direkt vor dem Hotel stehen Tuk Tuks bereit, für den Fall, dass man doch einmal in die Stadt möchte – sehr praktisch! Besonders hervorzuheben ist der großartige Service. Siri und sein Team haben sich wirklich rund um die Uhr um uns gekümmert und uns das Gefühl gegeben, willkommen und bestens versorgt zu sein.

Das Essen war ein weiteres Highlight. Es war köstlich und ließ keine Wünsche offen. Insgesamt können wir dieses Hotel uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen – ein Ort, an den wir definitiv wieder zurückkehren möchten!
title: Perfekter Aufenthalt in einer traumhaften Umgebung

text: This hotel is really a gem in Hikkaduwa. Located on the more quiet part of the beach, but only a 15 minute beachwalk to the more crowded areas. We stayed for seven nighs. The rooms were clean, the breakfast perfect! And the people working there is really the best!  If we come back, we will definetly stay again!
title: Great hotel in Hikkaduwa

ownerResponse/text:
We are thrilled to read this review because you convey how much pleasure you had during your time with us. That is really uplifting for our staff who are anxious to provide a happy experience. Thank-you for sharing your thoughts about Suite Lanka with Tripadvisor followers. Travel well.
Best regards
The Suite Lanka team
placeInfo/address: 868 Galle Rd Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
We stayed for five nights in a deluxe double room on the first floor with a balcony facing the ocean. The view was fantastic, ever changing from sunrise to sunset.  The room was cool, spacious and equipped with everything we needed. There were no intrusive noises so we slept very well in the large comfortable bed. 
The breakfasts were excellent and we enjoyed several very nice dinners overlooking the beach. The staff were just great, always smiling, chatting and willing to help.
The hotel is in a quieter area of Hikkaduwa beach, which we really appreciated, but is still close to restaurants and grocery stores, and a short tuk tuk ride to the centre.
The beach is fabulous, stretching for what seems like miles in either direction, and wonderfully calm and peaceful close to the hotel.
We were looking for a relaxing beachside stay for the final stop on our Sri Lankan adventure and couldn’t have asked for more. Many thanks to the team!
title: Wonderful Small Hotel with Immaculate Service

ownerResponse/text:
Zunächst einmal möchten wir uns für die Toilettenstörung entschuldigen. Vielen Dank aber für Ihre Anmerkungen zu unserem engagierten Nachtwächter. Wir sind sehr glücklich, ihn zu haben, und er ist ein wichtiger Teil unseres Teams – es freut uns, dass er Lob erhält. Wir legen stets besonderen Wert darauf, alleinreisenden Frauen eine unterstützende und entspannte Atmosphäre zu bieten. Ihre Kommentare sind daher sehr ermutigend für uns. Sollten Sie Sri Lanka bald wieder besuchen, besuchen Sie uns doch einfach.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen
Ihr Suite Lanka Team
placeInfo/address: 868 Galle Rd Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
.....war ich nur eine Nacht in diesem Hotel. Ich hatte kurzfristig gebucht. Der Kontakt über David Hopp war sehr gut. 

Ich war schon in vielen Hotels auf dieser Welt aber so einen Service habe ich noch nie erlebt. Vom Manager bis zu den Mitarbeitern, selbst die Frau die draußen gefegt hat - alle so freundlich und hilfsbereit. 

Die Toilettenspülung in meinem Zimmer funktionierte nicht und da gerade sonst keiner da war, hat sich der Security-Mann gleich darum gekümmert, obwohl das sicher nicht seine Aufgabe gewesen wäre. Als ich später am Abend vom Strandspaziergang kam, hat er mich bis zu meinen Zimmer geleitet und darauf geachtet, dass ich hinter mir ja abschließe. 

Die Pool-Suite war sehr schön und ich hab mich darin fast verloren. Vom Bett hat man den direkten Blick auf das Meer, so möchte man jeden Morgen wach werden. 

Siri - einer der Kellner spricht sogar deutsch. Es gibt noch einen weiteren Kellner, der deutsch spricht - leider weiß ich den Namen nicht.

Alles in allem war das ein GAANNZZZ toller Aufenthalt und ich habe es schwer bereut, dass es nur für eine Nacht war. Beim nächsten Mal bleib ich länger!!
title: Leider.....

ownerResponse/text:
Thank-you for such an enthusiastic review. Hug status is given to the best! We are delighted you found Sri Lanka - and Suite Lanka - so uplifting, and we look forward tio welcoming you again
Best regards
The Suite Lanka team
placeInfo/address: 868 Galle Rd Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
Our two weeks in Sri Lanka has been the best holiday we think we’ve ever had. Half of that time (the relaxing half!) was spent based out of Suite Lanka in Hikkaduwa.  

A Colonial style hotel nestled neatly and beautifully on Narigama Beach (a 20 minute stroll south of the hugely inferior Hikka beach strip), Suite Lanka ticks all the boxes as a small, personal, quality and welcoming boutique hotel. We just loved it and departing after a week felt like leaving family - hugs were involved.
The hotel team runs to 13 staff - just about outnumbering guests- and everyone did everything they possibly could to make our week special. It’s such a team effort that I’m not going to pick out individual staff members for particular praise - they’re all getting a mention.  Siri, Roshan and Kumara as the management team were enormously helpful in facilitating trips and activities for us, as well as being all round good eggs. The restaurant is rightly very well regarded across Hikka and the service provided by Sithum and Madura is first rate.  The food is extremely good and whilst the kitchen team (that’ll be Janaka, Vishwq, Krishan and Kanthi - 👍) are rightly proud of their excellent curry and rice, the star of the show for us might well have been the Sri Lankan breakfast.  Sithum and Madura provide unobtrusive and excellent housekeeping (hibiscus flowers on the made beds every day!) and both Pradeep - security - and Shiroma - gardening- gave evening and morning smiles and waves respectively. 
Sri Lankan people are universally kind, gentle giving. Suite Lanka and its staff epitomise that. We’ll be back.
title: What a find!

ownerResponse/text:
Thank-you for taking the time to review us on Tripadvisor - someting we really value. We pride ourselves on providing a safe and happy atmosphere for children of all ages and few things please us more than seeing how quiockly most of them regard Suite Lanka as home. Thank-you for your generous comments about the room and view, and the food. We hope to see you again one day.
Best regards
The Suite Lanka team
placeInfo/address: 868 Galle Rd Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
We travelled with our 15 month old and the staff were all so helpful and friendly. They even offered to keep her while we had dinner which was very kind of them. Everyone from the security at the property was always happy to help and was always with a smile on their face!

The rooms were a pleasant surprise! So well thought out and had all the comforts you could ask for. To wake up to the view of the ocean from your bed is such a luxury.

The beach area was maintained so well and our little one had the best time running on that beach.

Oh and last but not least the food! All the dishes we tried was so delicious and the portions were extremely generous. They had a kids menu which was was great and even got us milk rice even though we forgot to inform them in advance. All the staff there went above and beyond.

It was the perfect beach getaway and we can’t wait to be back!
title: The Perfect Family Getaway

text: We stayed for 4 nights in this little piece of old colonial history, a boutique  hotel with charm and style, the rooms were spacious and the beds amazing, we ate twice in the evenings but had breakfast every day, the food was excellent, with a good choice of Sri Lankan and European dishes on offer. placeInfo/address: 868 Galle Rd Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
Perfect choice for 4 nights chilling after the cultural tour of the island the previous 9 days.
Beautifully located right on the beach with brilliant views from the room and large balcony with sofa for comfort.
From start to finish the staff were so helpful, attentive, cheerful and friendly - Siri especially so 😁
Food and service was excellent and a nice choice of cocktails too.
Pool was cool, clean and in the shade so nice to cool down 
Room was really nice, 4 poster with mossie nets but we didn’t use them and never got bitten. A/c and fan worked well too.
Wife loved the flower petals on the bed on arrival and through the stay.
Will definitely go back if/when we visit again.
title: Perfect chill out place

text: Lovely stay. Everyone was so hospitable and super friendly especially with our 2 year old. Siri and Madura were very welcoming and helpful. Rooms were lovely and clean. The hotel is located on the quiet and chill end of hikkaduwa beach, which allowed a peaceful stay with no loud music!

placeInfo/address: 868 Galle Rd Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text: Suite Lanka is one of those places that just gets everything right. The architecture is beautiful, the food is dangerously good (you’ll want seconds, maybe thirds). The staff are the kind of people who make you feel like an old friend rather than a guest. The rooms have this old-world charm—spacious, super clean, and full of character—plus, the ocean views are so good, you might catch yourself just staring out the window for way too long.
title: Perfect beach stay

text:
This is the opposite of a gleaming impersonal chain hotel. It is an ideal place for a relaxed laid-back stay that seems sometimes like visiting family.

We stayed 11 nights, and could happily have stayed longer.

text:
Хороший отель, все понравилось , персонал самый приветливый из всех, что я встречала , очень стараются во всем , завтраки не самые разнообразные, но все вкусно, за 12 дней не надоело, мебель и плитка в номере видно, что не новые, но при этом ничего критичного точно, вполне можно комфортно жить, лобби и зона с лежаками у бассейна - это вообще 100/10, лежаки удобные, всегда есть свободные , также есть зонтики, песок на пляже у отеля самый мягкий и плавный заход в воду, рядом пляж с черепахами и кучу заведений, расположение отеля тоже👍
В общем мы очень довольны, хотя переживали , начитавшись негативных отзывов, однозначно рекомендую , если вы также как мы раздумываете)

text:
Abbiamo pernottato qui per 2 giorni, con cena e colazione compresi.
L'hotel è praticamente sopra il mare, la vista è meravigliosa, anche se nuotare lì davanti, non è proprio semplice per via delle onde, ma l'hotel ha una bellissima piscina, proprio con vista mare. A 2 passi dall'hotel c'è anche la spiaggia delle tartarughe, che vengono a mangiare dalle mani, peccato i turisti maleducati e idioti.
Comunque, la camera era spaziosissima, con tutti i confort necessari, il cibo era abbondante e veramente tanto buono, li staff super gentile e amorevole.
Lo consiglio vivamente☺️

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
Недавно мы с женой вернулись из незабываемого путешествия на остров Шри-Ланка, где остановились в отеле Coral Rock by Bansei. 

Хочу поделиться своими впечатлениями об этом прекрасном месте.

Отель расположен  в самом центре Хиккадува. На побережье океана .

Персонал отеля был очень дружелюбным и гостеприимным, готовым помочь в любых вопросах и создать комфортную атмосферу.

Номера в отеле были чистыми и уютными . Из окон открывался потрясающий вид на океан. 

Завтраки в отеле были разнообразными и вкусными, предлагались блюда местной и европейской кухни. Обеды и ужины можно было заказать на свой вкус по меню ресторана. Трёх разовое питание у нас женой выходило в стоимость путевки.

Шеф-повару особая благодарность.

Территория отеля с не большим бассейном и зоной отдыха. 

Мы смогли насладиться красотой подводного мира и увидеть множество разнообразных рыб и других морских обитателей.

В целом, я остался очень доволен своим пребыванием в отеле Coral Rock by Bansei на острове Шри-Ланка. Рекомендую этот отель для отдыха и знакомства с красотами острова.

Обязательно вернусь на Шри Ланку .

И , надеюсь , не один раз.
title: Прекрасный отель чудесная страна.

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text: Были в отеле 04.12.2024-16.12.2024 г. В целом отелю можно поставить твердую 4*. Мы брали завтраки/ ужины. На завтрак всегда был шведский стол, если вы ждете европейский затрак, не ждите, из европейского был только омлет, но готовили его на 3. Завтраки однообразные больше заточены на местную кухню (сосиски с непонятным составом, лапша, рис, курица/рыба карри, немного овощей, печеные бобы, картофель, местные лепешки, оладьи, сухие завтраки) Если вы не придирчивы к еде то найдите что поесть, но если вы предпочитаете стандартный набор еды на утро, будет сложнее. Чай, кофе, молоко были всегда. Кофе не вкусный. Фрукты сезонные, у нас всегда были: ананасы, арбузы, бананы, папайя. Соки два варианта из пакета и смузи из фруктов. Ужины были заказное меню, но думаю именно это их и спасло, каждый вечер подавали разный набор, за 12 дней ни разу не повторились, ужина на 5. Всегда был салат, суп, на выбор горячее (курица, мясо, рыба) с разными гарнирами, сладкое на выбор или фруктовая тарелка или десерты ( кстати оказались очень вкусными!) также на ужин чай или кофе. Алкоголь по меню за отдельную плату, пиво в отеле самое дороге из всех рядом расположенных кафе 1200 рупий ( рядом в кафе 850-900, в магазине 570), коктейли примерно везде 1500- 3000 рупий.  Рядом огромное количество кафе, ресторанов, цены разные, качество еды тоже, нужно искать для себя. С видом на море дороже. Через дорогу дешевле, (например Skandia, отличное место через дорогу в сторону Hikka Tranz) в некоторые кафе можно со своим алкоголем. Средний чек на двоих с пивом по одному блюду на каждого 6800- 8500 рупий, ужины чуть дороже. Алко магазинов рядом тоже много. Виды из отеля конечно 5, уборка на 3, но для Азии норм, сервис на 5, все стараются помочь, подсказать. Сам отель маленький, номера тоже небольшие, нам достался даже без шкафа, вместо него была ниша с перекладиной. Интернет отличный на всей территории отеля. Если хорошо плаваете можно купаться прямо перед отелем, волна есть, но не критично, с детьми или тем кто плавать не умеет лучше уходить в сторону отеля Hikka Tranz, там нет волн и место кормления черепах. Все в шаговой доступности, очень удобно.
title: Отличный отдых, красивые виды

text: Отличный отель на 0 линии. Море прямо под ногами, очень приветливый персонал. Хорошие завтраки, ежедневная уборка. Рекомендую брать номер с видом на море, утренний кофе с видом на океан это бесценно, номера на дорогу немного больше по размеру, но балко у них выходит на шумную дорогу.
title: Хиккадува, отель Coral Rock на линии прибоя.

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text: Отдыхали в отеле семьёй с 24.11.24 по 03.12.24. Номер брали с видом на океан. Вид конечно потрясающий, и шум океана завораживает. Отель не большой, своей территории совсем нет. Но для нас это было не критично. Мы гуляли по окрестностям, благо есть где разгуляться рядом и кафешки и фрукты и просто магазинчики где можно купить все необходимое. В отеле есть бассейн не большой но чистый, дочь купалась каждый день, мы конечно предпочитали океан, далеко ходить не надо спустился вниз по лестнице от бассейна и сразу он. Персонал , отзывчивый что не попросишь все стараются сделать, уборка номера каждый день, воду пополняют тоже каждый день. В номере конечно не помешало бы сделать ремонт. А так все чисто. Брали только завтраки, каждый день фрукты, яйца, тосты, сухие завтраки, Карри с курицей, Карри с рыбой и многое другое голодными мы не были никогда. Нам все очень понравилась. Если еще будем на Шри то возможно снова в этот отель.
title: Шикарный океан....

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text: Шикарное расположение отеля, прекрасный заход в океан. Брали завтраки+ужины и остались очень довольны. Завтраки стандартные, а ужины - шедевр. За семь дней ужин ни разу не повторился. Необычные закуски, очень вкусные супы с горячими пышками и сливочным маслом, на горячее можно выбрать курицу, говядину или рыбу, а десерты - просто восторг - мороженое с панкейками, паннакота, брауни и много чего еще. За троих взрослых доплатили за ужины 100$. Если бы ужинали в барах, то вышло бы гораздо дороже. Рядом с отелем есть всё: рыбы, черепахи, рифовые акулы, мурены, огромные вараны и колония летучих лисиц (перейти через дорогу и немного углубиться, есть точка на гугл-карте). Однозначно рекомендую отель.
title: Прекрасный отель!

text: Отель небольшой,без своей территории,зато прямо на берегу, что позволяло во время завтраков и ужинов в ресторане наслаждаться видом океана. Персонал очень доброжелательный и отзывчивый.Уборка в номерах,замена белья и полотенец, пополнение воды,чая,сахара,кофе ежедневно.Что касается еды, то т.к. я была в самом начале сезона, ужины периодически были по меню,пару раз был шведский стол(в выходные дни в отель приезжали местные). Рыба,морепродукты и фрукты были всегда. Мой номер на втором этаже,окна на дорогу,но я все равно засыпала под шум океана - здорово! Wi-Fi в номере периодически вылетал, в холле и лобби ловит лучше. Есть небольшая библиотека, порадовал выбор книг на русском языке)) недалеко от отеля пляж, на который приплывают большие черепахи, их можно гладить и кормить. Там же, чуть дальше коралл, на нем полно рыбок и морских ежей.Большое спасибо персоналу отеля за комфортный и спокойный отдых!
title: Уютный отель на берегу океана

text:
I had a pleasant stay at this hotel and would rate it 4 stars. The room was clean and well-maintained, and the service throughout my stay was very good. While the overall decor is more on the old-fashioned side (I personally prefer a more modern style), it was still comfortable and charming in its own way.

A special shoutout to Sadun, the man behind the noodles, absolutely delicious and always served with a smile. Also, many thanks to Suppun, who welcomed us warmly at the entrance and made the first impression a great one.

Overall, a solid stay with great hospitality!
